name: Helena's Boathouse
description:
"An island in Ghent."
Are you looking for something unique on the water, a touch of history touch combined with a panoramic view on the 'Handelsdok' - in full development.
'Helena's Boathouse' is the bigger sister of 'Helena's Cabin' on a former cargo ship.
Besides visiting Ghent, in our B&B you can cosily browse through the many art books or relax with a good read.
You can also enjoy a range of fine wines.

Enjoy on and off the water!
#sleepbetteronthewater

The space
* In the entrance you also have a historical corner with lavabo
* Then you enter the open kitchen with bar table that is equipped for cooking (gas stove) and a cozy sitting area overlooking the terrace.
* To the right you have a separate wet room with shower and toilet.
* Downstairs there is a cozy bedroom with a comfortable king size bed.
* Terrace: In fine weather you can also enjoy the beautiful view of the water outside on the deck.
neighborhood_overview:
'HELENA's Boathouse' is located in the new neighbourhood 'De Nieuwe Dokken' (The New Docks) in the city’s harbour with the cranes as historical beacons, nearby Dampoort station and close to the beauty of the Centre of Ghent.
You have an ideal base if you want to make day trips to other cities in Belgium. Antwerp, Brussels, Bruges or Ostend are only 30/40 minutes away by train.

name: Spacious loft in the historical centre
description:
Spacious loft in the heart of the historic centre of Ghent.
One minute walk from the central historical sights, supermarkets, shopping and drinking & dining occasions.

I hope to welcome you soon!
(Price includes tourist city tax)

The space
Spacious loft with very bright living area.
Bedroom with double bed.
Bathroom with toilet, huge bathtub and walk-in shower.
Fully equipped kitchen + Nespresso machine (cups are provided).
Fast WiFi (60mbps).
Flat screen TV.
Double sofa bed.
Perfect for a couple + 1/2 ppl.

Guest access
The entire third floor of the house is yours. You have a private loft.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the historic centre of Ghent. Almost every "must visit place" is on a walking distance. Our neighbourhood is known for its young and hip vibe, where you can find coffee bars, vintage shops, book markets, nice restaurants and the most swinging bars of Ghent!

Although we are located in the centre of the city, it is always quiet in our street.
host_about: Hi! I'm Laurens! Welcome to Ghent :)

name: Ruime gezinswoning met stadstuin
description:
Ons huis is een ruime en gezellige plek op 3km van het oude centrum van Gent. Als foodie maak je gebruik van onze volledig uitgeruste keuken of doe je beroep op de Thai en Turkse take-aways in de buurt. Ledeberg Leeft! Je vindt er alles wat je nodig hebt op wandelafstand! Logeren in ons huis betekent: veel ruimte, veel licht, kindvriendelijk, groene stadstuin, een lieve poes Amy en véél planten... en dit allemaal op wandel-, fiets- of tramafstand van het historische centrum van Gent!

The space
Ons huis is ruim en licht, een verrassing als je binnenkomt!
Open leefruimte en keuken worden verwarmd met vloerverwarming.
Een groene stadstuin met terras en BBQ, ideaal om even te vluchten uit de drukte van de stad...

Guest access
Wij hebben geen afgesloten ruimtes en rekenen er dan ook op dat jullie respectvol met onze spullen omgaan.

Other things to note
Amy is onze lieve kat. Please be gentle and loving to her
neighborhood_overview: Ledeberg leeft! is geen holle slogan. Op amper 3km van het historische centrum Gent, kan je in Ledeberg werkelijk alles vinden! Supermarkten,Turkse kruideniers, nachtwinkels, stoffenwinkels, hippe én volkse café's, zondagse markt op het Kerkplein, boerenmarkt op woensdagnamiddag,  Aziatische, Italiaanse en Turkse restaurants, enz....
host_about:
We are a family of 4 and a cat: my husband, me & our 16-year old twins Dante & Mila. Our cat is called Amy.
We love to cook, wine & dine. We're also a member of Home-exchange, and swapped homes several times. Now that our children are growing older, we want to travel more!

name: Cozy Apartment in City Harbour with Garden
description:
The apartment is located in the birthplace of Ghent: Portus Ganda. It's nearby the city centre (5min walk), close to restaurants and shops. The coolest bars and clubs are just around the corner. You can relax in our shared patio, the park nearby or sit at the waterside just in front of the building.

The apartment fits perfect for city trippers, families or small groups (4-6 people). Upstairs are two more apartments. Only the entrance hall is shared. There is a city tax of € 3 /p./n.(extra).

The space
The apartment has only recently been renovated and is situated in the sous-terrain of our mansion house, but there is a lot of light. You also have access to the patio.

One bedroom gives immediate access to the living room (see photo).

The apartment is located in a prime location. That makes our not most luxurious apartment leave, nevertheless, an admirable moment for our guests. It is also practical that loading and unloading at the
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the birthplace of Ghent: Portus Ganda. This peaceful city-harbour has a unique sphere which you can't find anywhere else in the city center.
host_about: I am Pello Mugica Gonzalez. My grandfather is Basque-Spanish, but I was born and raised in Ghent, Belgium. I have a balanced lifestyle where I combine travelling, studying and working. Currently, I am graduated as a Business Engineer, specialized in Data Analytics. Most of my interest goes to photojournalism and humanitarian aid projects.

name: Breathtaking Views in ❤ of Ghent with Hot Tub
description:
Renovated in January '18!
This apartment, built in 1864, is located in the very heart of Ghent: the Ajuinlei, the street with Parisian allure, close to all the most beautiful spots in Ghent. You can expect incredible views from the terrace over the Lys canal.
The place is 75m² and although in the very center of Ghent, it is amazingly quiet. Large Hot Tub/Jacuzzi for 2 in the bathroom.
Opera: 150m
Graslei: 310m
Kouter square: 180m
Koophandel Square: 65m
Restaurants: 1m
Aula & Het Pand: 200m

The space
The apartment has a beautiful hard wooden floor, very high ceilings, kitchen with a lot of equipment and dishwasher, very large bedroom, and a bathroom with a Whirlpool bad. On the terrace you will find place for up to 4 persons. Feel free to water the many herbs and flowers.

Views from the terrace and windows in the living room:
- The tower of the Belfry with the golden dragon
- The tower of the St Baafs
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is very unique because it is one of the very very few which has a large balcony with a stunning view on the canal. I looked around and I could only find 5 or 6 in the city center with a balcony where you could put a table. In the street you can find many good and affordable restaurants. I will send you a list of my preferred places.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Bert and I find it wonderful to discover new places, meeting interesting people, and to cook some food. Feel free to ask me any questions.
Have a nice day,
Bert

name: Fin-de-Siécle room in a Belle-Epoque house
description:
A bright and nicely Art-Nouveau decorated room with all the necessities for a pleasant stay located on the first floor of a Belle-époque house in a calm residential neighbourhood; just a 10 minutes walk from Gent-Dampoort train station (FlixBus - Eurolines) and a 20 minutes walk to the wonderful historic centre. Also in the immediate vicinity, there are facilities available. Directions to discover the city will be put at your disposal. Extra measures are taken for a corona-safe environment.

The space
A cozy and comfortable room filled with light on the street side of the house which will make you feel at home in no time. The charm of the house from 1912 comes with a series of stairs leading to your room on the first floor and bathroom located on the basement floor. A comfortable canopy bed, a desk, a seating area, an eating area, and on top of that sole coffee and tea facilities are awaiting you. The L-shaped room is larger than seen in the pictures because a p
neighborhood_overview: A quiet Belle-Epoque residential neighborhood with all kinds of facilities in the area. Two parks around the corner, for a drink & lunch you do not have to walk more than 2 minutes, a bakery & supermarkets take up 1 to 7 minutes to reach. A multicultural neighborhood with all sorts of eateries within 10 minutes; from hipsterbar to kebab. 20 to 25 minutes walk from the historic center which is lively flooded by students, locals and tourists offers a very extensive choice of dining options. 15 minutes walk from both the Beguinages of Sint Amandberg and Onze Lieve Vrouw ter Hoyen, both UNESCO World Heritage, just like the Belfry Tower (Het Belfort) in the lively historic center. You easely need multiple days to explore this city.
host_about:
Hello!

Thank you for your interest and for visiting my profile. 

I consider myself a gentle and soft spoken person. I have hosted guests for many years besides my job.

You are welcome to contact me and share the nature of your trip and/ or stay, so that I may facilitate the necessary arrangements for you.

name: Furnished 2 person apartment for rent in Ghent
description:
We offer a spacious & modern fully furnished & equipped apartment, close to the center of Ghent, within 1 hour from Bruges, Antwerp and Brussels. The flat has a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, WiFi, flatscreen TV, queen size boxspring and sofabed. Minimum stay is 1 month.

The space
Our furnished flat is fully equipped with the following appliances & facilities:
- 60m² spacious, modern apartment
- Ideal for 2 persons
- Newly built and decorated (2015)
- Central heating system with thermostat
- High-speed Internet (WiFi & 3 LAN connections)
- Cable TV
- Private underground parking space (one car)
- Secured bicycle parking
- Separate storage room in basement (4m²)
- Free Ghent city guide
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Zwijnaarde (south of Ghent) opposite the UGent Technology Park. It’s less than 3 km from the Sint-Pieters train station and about 5 km from the city center. It’s in the immediate vicinity of both the E40 & E17 highway, the major traffic axes running through Belgium. From Ghent it’s also easy to explore other cities like Bruges, Brussels, Antwerp or the Belgian coast… They’re all within 50 km from Ghent.

Ghent is one of Europe’s best-kept secrets. It is small enough to still feel cosy yet dynamic enough to have that lively urban feel. The city offers a unique blend of medieval whimsy that reflects its long history in combination with a vibrant and contemporary edge. It has the great benefit that it’s off the beaten tourist trail with stunning architecture along its canals, great food, quirky cafés, and some of Belgium’s most interesting museums.

name: M/S Carpe-Diem "Deck House" - Studio on a Barge
description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's deck house has been completely renovated into a comfortable, modern studio of 30 square meter.  The deck house accommodates max. 2 people, with a living/bed room, kitchen, separate bathroom with toilet and shower, as well as a washing machine and tumble dryer. Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​
The renovations started in 2015, based on a novel concept whereby the cargo hold remained intact and the main residence - consisting of contain
host_about:
Hello, I am Filip, father of two beautiful daughters and husband of an exceptional wife.

A few years ago we bought an old ship - actually in a flash of absolute lack of sense of reality.  In the meantime, we have renovated the ship and transformed it into a modern home.  Feel free to view the photos, the ship is the ideal base camp for exploring the city of Ghent and Flanders.

Travel safely ... and maybe see you soon, in Ghent.

Filip & C°

Koffie, thee en water voorzien (geen ontbijt). Gedeelde badkamer.

name: Nieuwe flat in historisch centrum
description:
In een historisch pand, gelegen in hartje Gent, bieden we een eigentijds trendy, volledig ingericht appartement aan. Recent volledig nieuw appartement met groot inpandig terras, in een hippe winkelbuurt vlakbij het Gravensteen en de Leie.

The space
Spacious apartment with fully equipped kitchen, large bedroom with dressing, luxury bathroom with rainshower and large roofgarden.

Other things to note
Minimum stay of 2 nights
neighborhood_overview:
Situated nearby Vrijdagsmarkt, Gravensteen and Patershol, with view on river Leie.
Perfectly located to visit the old center of Ghent, for shopping and to discover the many trendy restaurants. All this on walking distance.
Public parking nearby.
host_about: From a personal experience of staying in an authentic setting where quality and comfort are key, we offer fully furnished apartments in the center of Antwerp and Ghent for short and long term stays. name: Studio lumineux et confortable
description:
A cinq minutes à pied de la gare Saint Pierre, au centre de Gent, magnifique studio de 48 m2 avec un grand balcon plein sud, sans vis à vis. Un parking gratuit, privé. Tout confort avec un vrai lit. Wifi et télévision écran plat.

The space
Studio de 48 m2, avec grand balcon avec table et chaises au soleil et sans vis à vis. Armoire à disposition. Equipement de cuisine complet.

Guest access
L'accès à l'appartement est indépendant. Aucun contact.
Clé dans la boîte aux lettres no.20. Vous ouvrez le couvercle de la boîte en fer vous mettez le code 6521. Quand vous partez vous remettez les clefs et brouillez le code

Other things to note
Suite à la situation sanitaire, des mesures d'hygiène sont strictement respectées (linge de maison lavé en laverie, gel hydroalcoolique dans la cuisine, femme de ménage désinfecte drastiquement).
neighborhood_overview:
Tous les transports en commun sont à maximum 7 minutes du studio.
Le parking privé gratuit est très appréciable.
host_about: Bonjour, je m'appelle Catherine avec mon compagnon Thierry nous avons trois logements aussi agréables les uns que les autres. Nous aimons recevoir et être reçus. Nous aimons faire connaître nos lieux de vie et surtout partager notre joie de vivre. En espérant vous rencontrer prochainement soit comme hôtes soit comme voyageurs.

description:
Welcome to the Zebra House! In a large comfortable house in Ghent you can relax with a group of friends or family (max 10pp). You have everything you need for a pleasant stay. The house is an oasis of space and tranquility. The house is located at a tram stop, so you are in the heart of beautiful Ghent in 8 minutes. Decoration and beautiful light, we really like that. The hostess herself is a writer by profession and can be found during the week in her writing studio (ground floor).

The space
The rooms available to guests are located on the first, second and third floors. The rooms are ready and spacious: 250 m2 in total!

2nd floor:
bedroom with 1 double bed
bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 single bed
bedroom with two single beds and kitchen
bathroom

spacious attic with a double bed and possibly up to 2 extra sleeping places in the comfortable pull-out sofa bed
kitchenette
seating area

Near t
neighborhood_overview: When you discover Ghent, you will notice why this city was chosen by National Geographic as one of the most authentic cities in the world. Also nice: Bruges is half an hour from Ghent, Antwerp, Brussels and the sea (!) at one hour and Paris at 3 hours.
host_about: I'm a mother, a television maker and an airbnb host. I love to create the right atmosphere in the house. Make it a nice place on earth. Cosy and joyfull. I love to invent new stuff, I like singing and l love roasted chicken with warm apples.

neighborhood_overview: Klein Turkije verbindt de Korenmarkt en het Sint-Baafsplein, vanuit ons appartement kijk je op de Sint-Niklaaskerk.  Je stapt buiten in de uitgangsbuurt, bent op wandelafstand van bezienswaardigheden en van het museumdistrict.
host_about: Samen met mijn gezin ga ik graag op verkenning in Europa.  Een toffe slaapplek waar onze 3 kinderen zich goed voelen is de start van een geslaagde reis.  Daarom verhuren wij zelf ook graag aan gezinnen met kinderen !

name: Curiosity room in a Belle-Epoque house
description:
The room is approx. 20sqm, located on the second floor of the house; the toilets and the bathroom are located on the ground and in the basement floors. At a 10 minute walk distance to Gent-Dampoort train station, nearby bus stations. Less than 20 minutes of walking and you are in the historical center. Also ideal for trips to Bruges, Antwerp, or Brussels. The room & house is very clean, safe, and peaceful. Extra measures are taken for a corona-safe environment. Looking forward to host you :)

The space
A spacious and comfortable nicely decorated room which will make you feel at home. Windows are looking towards the streetside in a calm neighborhood. The charm of the house from 1912 comes with a series of stairs leading to your room on the second floor and bathroom located on the basement floor. A comfortable double bed, arm seats, and a desk/eating area with coffee and tea facilities are awaiting you.
***The room has a lock from inside of the room***
neighborhood_overview:
A rather calm residential neighbourhood from the beginning of the 20th century with nice Art-Nouveau, Art-Deco and late neoclassical houses. Somewhat in between a lively multicultural neighbourhood of Dampoort trainstation (Dendermondsesteenweg) and the residential neighbourhoods of the surrounding the oldest and commercial core of the city.

Some bars, a bakery, nightshops, snackbars and supermarkets are located in the neighbourhood; plenty more being located in the historic center at 15/20 minutes walking from the house.

name: Well-situated and Comfortable Home.
description:
Our house is situated in a quiet neighborhood close to the station of Ghent.
The historical Center can easily be reached on foot or by bus (10- minutes). The University Hospital (UZ) is within walking distance. The house is supplied with all conveniences.
It's spacious (145 m2), with a very reliable, high-speed internet connection.
This house offers you an ideal place to work, live and feel at home.

The space
The house has a ground floor and two upper floors.
On the ground floor is a modern, well- equipped, brand new kitchen. Dishwashers, oven, microwave, gas range, cooking range, refrigerator , freezer, ... are provided. There is an ample supply of crockery and cooking equipment.
There is a small terrace and a spacious dining area.
There is also a comfortable seating area where you can watch television quietly.
The ground floor has underfloor heating.
There are 2 bedrooms, one on the first floor and another on the second
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a quiet neighborhood.
There are some nice restaurants within walking distance (Greek, Italian, Belgian, Thai, ... )
There's also a nice little bakery where you can take breakfast, eat a Belgian waffle or have a snack all day long.
Around the corner you will find a supermarket, a bakery, a pharmacy, newsagent, ...
The University Hospital of Ghent is within walking distance.
host_about: I live in Ghent with my husband Jan. I like my city. I love cooking, baking and meeting people from all over the world. That's the reason why we have a comfortable, quiet and nice house next door to welcome you.

name: LOFT- Duplex-in canopy of trees center Ghent
description:
Genieten van een verwenweekje of een zakelijk verblijf in een stijlvol gemeubeld duplex dakapp. met terras ? Res. Domino is de perfecte oplossing voor jouw kort verblijf – zowel voor studie, werk, als voor een heerlijke vakantie in Gent-centrum.

The space
Ons dakappartement is recent helemaal nieuw ingericht en kreeg een eigentijdse cosy inrichting .
De studio heeft een groot terrasraam met toegang tot het dakterras waar men zich echt waant in de kruin van onze bomen ! Heerlijk zicht !

Een volledig uitgeruste leuken met frigo met diepvriesvak , combi-oven, electr. kookplaat,bestek, borden, kookmateriaal, Senseo koffiemachine met startpakket + theefaciliteiten voor 4 personen. Startpakket keukengerief en ontbijtgerief (confituur, choco), handdoeken.
Er is een aparte badkamer met inloopdouche, toilet, lavabomeubel + haardroger + startpakket badprodukten & badhanddoeken en handdoeken.
Zeer gezellige living met zetelbed (2pers.) , een één
neighborhood_overview:
Ons dakappartement is gelegen in één van de mooiste culturele woonwijken met mooie herenhuizen van Gent vlakbij het SMAK(5 min.stappen) en MSK , en op wandelafstand (15 min.) van het historisch centrum. Rustig gelegen. De studio bevindt zich aan de achterzijde en dus de zeer rustige tuinzijde van de residentie .
Heel wat leuke restaurantjes in de buurt, warme bakker om de hoek en hippe ontbijtgelegenheid en eetgelegenheden in de buurt . Ideaal voor een toeristisch bezoek zonder dat je echt een auto nodig hebt , gezien de talrijke busverbindingen op 20 m vanaf het St. Pieters-station en het historisch centrum. Ook perfect gelegen voor bezoekers met de auto , gezien de centrale ligging en goede bereikbaarheid vlakbij de afrit autostrade Gent-centrum met vlotte parkeergelegenheden in de buurt.
host_about: Ik ben architect en hou van reizen , nieuwe mensen ontmoeten, mooie dingen in het leven kunnen delen met anderen .

name: Something Els. Appartment in the heart of the city
description:
In a quiet alley, at the centre of the city, you can find our cosy holiday accommodation. We offer you our attic apartment for shorter or longer stays. It can easily take 2 adults or a family with two kids. It’s the ideal starting place to explore our marvellous city. We have been put by Toerisme Vlaanderen in Comfort Class. We look forward to host you in our stylish historical place. The space offers also temporarily exhibitions of young Ghent artists.

The space
Our spacious (50 m²) and quiet attic on the third floor offers you al facilities for two adults or a family with up to 2 children. There is a twin bed, and 2 couches suited for children up to 16 years. Additionally, we can provide a baby bed and baby chair. The room is equipped with a kitchen, and has a cozy dining and sitting area. In a spacious, fully equipped bathroom (on the second floor) you can enjoy a comfortable bath. The authentic wooden floors and the sober and stylish decoration give the wh
neighborhood_overview: Although our house is situated in the heart of the ancient city, you can enjoy the quietness of our authentic little street. A two minutes’ walk will take you to the bustling city centre. The medieval houses, the Castle of the Counts and the famous town towers, the attractive shopping area, cosy restaurants, coffee shops and bars with their 1000+ beers, you find them all within reach.
host_about:
Hallo, 
Ik woon in het centrum van Gent en vind het een plezier om mijn mooie burgerswoning te delen met tijdelijke bezoekers aan onze stad.  Ik woon zelf met mijn 2 jongvolwassen kinderen op het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping.  Op de tweede en de zolderverdieping hebben we een vakantieruimte ingericht.  Het is een mooi en ruim appartement voor 2 personen,  of voor een gezin met maximum 2 jonge kinderen.  We genieten van het internationale bezoek in ons huis.  Bezoekers geven zelf aan of ze zin hebben in een praatje.  We respecteren de privacy en je kan op eigen houtje de woning betreden en je weg vinden in het appartement.  
Van harte welkom.

name: Bright & Luxury City Centre apartment in Ghent
description:
Lovely renovated spacious and bright apartment with a sunny furnished balcony. Quietly situated on the edge of the medieval city of Gent. A 10' walk brings you to the heart of the vibrant core of this town with all its cafes & restaurants and its old cultural buildings,
The flat is comfortably furnished, and is also fully equipped for long-term rentals with unlimited WiFi.
The flat has an underground parking space.
Tram stop at 5' walk from the flat, and takes you to the train station in 15'

The space
The whole apartment is for your private use!
The apartment has one bedroom with a double bed (boxspring - 2 single attached to each other), with a possibility of an extra bed for a third person. This extra single bed can only be used if booked for a third person.
Bathroom with new walk-in shower, new washbasin with furniture, balance...
The kitchen is fully equipped (oven, microwave, freezer, fridge, induction, coffee machine, dishwas
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood. A short 10' walk will take you to the historical medieval 'core' of Ghent: a vibrant city thanks to its many pubs, restaurants surrounded by its beautiful cultural monuments.
Shopping is easy: shops within walking distance (up to 1 km) or you can also use the tram.
A tram stop is less than 5' walking distance. The tram can easily take you to many locations in Ghent, including to the train station in 15 min

name: Luxurious suite in the historic centre of Ghent
description:
Our trendy accommodation is located in the centre of Ghent. The main market square is only 100 meters away.
There's a private bathroom with toilet, a bath, shower and sink. The apartment comes with a very large private green terrace, in the middle of the city.
We offer free Wifi and television.
Public parking "Vrijdagsmarkt" is nearby to park your car: 23€/24h.

There's an efficient check-in/-out process

We look forward to have you stay over with us!

The space
- Your accommodation room is on the first floor! Please note that you will have to take one staircase to reach the accommodation.
- Please note that this room offers 1 large double bed and it's not possible to request for twin bedding. Additional, a baby-bed can be provided.
- Free fast WiFi is available
- There are no cooking facilities (= no kitchen/cooking plates/microwave/oven/plates/glasses/cutlery...)

The accommodation also comes with the
neighborhood_overview: The accommodation can't be more central (!), located in a very calm alley between the waterside and one of the main shopping streets. Korenmarkt, Vrijdagsmarkt, Gravensteen all super close... The ideal hideout to explore thé most beautiful city of Belgium.
host_about:
Hi, we are Astrid and Gilles, 27 and 33. Born and raised in Moorslede and Bruges, we studied in Ghent and in Brussels. We fell in love and decided to settle in the beautiful city of Ghent. Whilst looking for a place to live, we bumped into what could be considered as one of the most centralised houses of Ghent. The house was old, dark and didn’t catch a lot of sunlight, but we saw a lot of possibilities to transform it into a little paradise in the ancient centre, close to all the hip and trendy places this city has to offer. As we travel a lot ourselves, we think we know what it takes to have a pleasant stay and discovering new cities and countries. We transformed the house in an ideal place for friends and guests visiting Ghent. By the summer of 2020 the house was finished.   
We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. 
Welcome in Ghent! 
Astrid & Gilles
x

name: Rooftop terrace, stunning view in city center
description:
- Stunning apartment in the old city center
- The apartment is equipped with all modern comfort so that you feel completely at home
- Surrounded by Ghent's signature medieval architecture
- Enjoy a drink on our rooftop terrace with nice views over St-John's church and the beautiful skyline of Ghent
- You are in the middle of the city so there are lots of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, etc. around.
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival

The space
This is a perfect accommodation for 4 in a great location in the centre of Gent, easily walkable to the centre of the town, restaurants, cafes and local shops.

The kitchen is very well equipped and the apartment has everything you might need.

Floor 1 and 2 each has a bedroom. These have a double bed and an "en-suite bathroom" with shower, sink and toilet.

The kitchen is located on the 3rd floor, together with the terrace which gives a vibran
neighborhood_overview:
We’re situated in the medieval centre of Ghent. The neighborhood is characterized as cozy and vibrant. A lot of restaurants and bars are just around the corner at walking distance.

The main attractions in Ghent are easily reached on foot: Korenmarkt, Sint-Michiels church, St Niklaas church, the Belfry, St Baafscathedral, Graslei, Gravensteen, Vrijdagsmarkt, St Jacobs church, Portus Ganda, Patershol, Kouter, etc.

You're right in the city center so everything you need is within walking distance; tourist sights, restaurants, bars, grocery stores, public transportion, etc. We'll gladly give you information about all this when you arrive.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Dino.
I have an antique shop in the medieval centre of Ghent. 
I’m here to go above and beyond to ensure all our guests enjoy their stay and to provide the best quality customer service possible. I’m blessed to call Ghent my home and I'm happy to share my love for this city!
I like to spend my free time with my family and enjoying what our beautiful city has to offer. I look forward to hosting you and providing you the best Airbnb experience.

name: Living The Dream - A Hidden Gem
description:
Living The Dream, een luxe loft in een gerestaureerd historisch gebouw. Gelegen in een autovrije straat in de levendige oude stadskern. In hartje Gent, vlak bij restaurants, bars, musea, shops. Vlot bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer.

The space
Vanuit de hall met apart gastentoilet, kom je binnen in ons geheel vernieuwd dakappartement. Je betreedt eerst de ruime woonkamer met een gezellige living, leeshoek, bureau, lange eettafel en een volledig uitgeruste open keuken. Eén slaapkamer heeft een tweepersoonsbed, de tweede en derde kamer , hebben telkens twee eenpersoonsbedden. De badkamer heeft een inloopdouche, dubbele lavabo en toilet. Buiten is er een groot zonneterras met tafels en stoelen.

Guest access
De volledige flat en het terras is ter beschikking. Er zijn geen gedeelde ruimtes. Op het gelijkvloers, fietsenstalling ter beschikking.

Other things to note
Minimum verblijf is 2 nachten. We willen u graag een zorg
neighborhood_overview:
Toplocatie !
Living The Dream is gelegen in Klein Turkije, een rustige uitgangsbuurt, in de schaduw van de Sint-Niklaaskerk. De meeste bezienswaardigheden bevinden zich tussen de Korenmarkt en de Sint-Baafs kathedraal. Op wandelafstand ontdek je de ganse binnenstad met trendy buurten, hippe shops, terrasjes en befaamde musea.
host_about:
We reizen de wereld rond, maar houden ongelooflijk veel van onze favoriete stad, Gent. 
We houden van een leuk optreden, een goede film, een origineel theaterstuk en een lekker hapje eten.
In de week , werken we hard, maar in het weekend genieten we van de mooie dinges des levens.

The garden is big and luxurious in a very quiet neighbourhood.

The space
All the places on the pictures are available for the guests.

The living has a fireplace.
the location is perfect to visit Ghent. 5 min walk from the train station and for 1,5 euro you take the tram right to the heart of the old town that takes 10 min.

neighborhood_overview: Quiet, green and still very close to all facilities. you can do everything by foot. Easy reachable with public transport and car. Private parking available on request beforehand.
host_about:
I am an Airline pilot. I live by myself and love to meet new people all over the world.
I am a sporty guy that likes to laugh. I play music and sing. 
I love Ghent, such a beatiful city. Even more then Bruges where I lived before.
I can tell you a lot about the city and show the nicest places to go to.
When I travel, I want to see and experiance as much as possible. I like to see how people really live and not take just the touristic paths.
If you come to my place you will experiance how the Belgian people really are and I am sure you will have an unforgettable time!

name: Spacious room with private kitchen
description:
This spacious room in the attic is recently entirely renovated. Its luminous and well insulated. The room is part of a charming old city-house and has its own kitchen. The bathroom and toilet are shared.

We're renting out this room to give guests a feeling of home in Ghent and to provide us with some euros for the final renovations of the other parts of the house.

The space
I'm a single mother of two (newborn twins) and currently renting out a part of the house to cover cost of the ongoing renovations of this 19th century house.

Although still ongoing, most renovation works are finished but the bathroom is still very basic and the hallway needs new paint. Nevertheless it's a charming old house in the typical Belgian style.

This house is located in the center of Ghent, on a fifteen minute walk from the historic heart. And on a ten minute walk from the train station (Ghent Dampoort). Trains go every hour to Brussels, and several tim
neighborhood_overview:
The house is very close to the city center but still accessible by car. Also the trainstation is nearby and we have lots of green (a garden and e view of a park at the other side) which gives a bit of a nice city vibe without being suffocated by the city itself.
Around the corner there are plenty of parks and playgrounds for kids and a cinema.
It takes a little walk to be in the historic heart of the city.
host_about:
As a freelance journalist and producer mainly in the Middle East, I am often travelling abroad. When I am in Belgian I am living alone in my house in the center of Ghent, with a spare room to rent out to people for short term projects. Besides these projects, the rooms are free for rent to anybody who is willing to visit the beautiful city of Ghent and its surroundings. During my stay abroad, my proper room is available as well. 

After being a host for more then eight years trough several ways, I still love it every day a bit more. Its amazing to host people from all over the world. To help them around if necesary and to give them the space an privacy they need to assure them the most pleasant stay they can imagine. Ghent can be crowded, and so can be the hotels and hostels, therefore I see renting out a part of my private house as a great opportunity for both guest and host.

name: PROSPERITE BOAT
description:
Prosperite boat is located in the charming industrial site on the waters of old Docks of Gent.
If you are looking for a unique experience, feeling of adventure and freedom, our ship is the place to be! The boat is good for couples and solo adventurers.

The space
It is a boat mariner cabin originally from 1960, kept in its most authentic design.
Duo to the compact size of our cute cabin, the bed and WC are secretly hidden inside closets. The place is modest and simple.
There is a separate kitchen completely equipped for cooking.
THE BED IS A SINGLE BED!! kept in its original size and design. Recommended for singles or couples who like to sleep tide and closely. Many guests have enjoyed the romantic side of it. We like to offer the best to our guests, so if you like to sleep spacious, we don't recommend it:)
Outside there is a terrace where you can enjoy the beautiful panoramic view on the water bay and have a nice drink and meal.
<
neighborhood_overview: The boat is located in a friendly boat community and  right next to a lively cultural space, one called DOK the other Bar bricolage,  a hangout place with plenty of activities, concerts, exhibitions and beach in the summer.

Nearby station, shopping center, numerous restaurants, public transport, most touristic activities within 20' walk ...

The space
Car-free square, no free parking space at the house.

Ghent Center has become car-free and public parking is expensive.
Less than 100m from your home: the underground garage "De Reep" – about 55€ for a weekend

Another option is free parking at the P&R car park:
P&R - Antwerpse Steenweg 956 - 9040 Oostakker (Ghent).
There you can take bus 18 to "Gent Centrum" and you can ask the bus driver where to get off, close to Lange Boomgaard 76, where your house is located.

Guest access
Entire house - 3 floors. 100% private

The house has a staircase to the first and second floor.

The space
You have the entire house to yourself. The garden is to be shared with our neighbours.

neighborhood_overview:

neighborhood_overview:
The stay sits in a quiet street just around the corner From the main station Gent-Sint Pieter's, with easy access to public transport.

In the direct proximity you can also find the museum district with main sites such as the STAM, the museum about the history of the city Ghent from early medieval times till now.
The MSK, the museum for old fine arts with all the masters such as Jordaens, Ruebens, Van Eyck and so much more. The GUM, the university museum located next to the botanical gardens with greenhouses which are free to visit.
Or the SMAK, which houses a very nice collection of modern and contemporary art with different exhibitions from time to time.

The old abbey Bijloke can be reached on a beautiful 10 -15 min walk, which brings you along the outskirts of the historic busy citycenter and all the real Ghent locations.

name: Stylish room in a warmhearted home + city garden
description:
If you pick our home for your stay in Ghent, you don't book just a place to sleep but an entire experience with an experienced host in a lovely home!

My house is located in a lively, multicultural neighborhood just outside the citycenter. You share the house with me my five year old son Charlie.

What previous guests have said:
- Very comfortable bed
- House decorated with great taste
- Very welcoming host
- A bit far from center (but public transport at 2 min)
- Thin walls so a bit noisy

The space
You are renting the bedroom on the first floor of a 3-floor house. The room is designed for short to mid-term stays, with a double bed and a wardrobe.

Guest access
Apart from your own room, you have access to the shared spaces: bathroom (with shower, bath tub, and washing machine), toilet, living room & dining area, toys and tv, kitchen and garden.

Other things to note
- I have
neighborhood_overview:
I live in a lively multicultural neighbourhood, which has its pros and cons. I love my neighbourhood because of the social mix and how this translates into the social and cultural scene. Streets can be lively, with kids and people hanging out on the streets, also in the evening (especially in summer). Downside is that this sometimes leads to some noise, but most of the time nothing exuberant.

Other reasons why I like my neighbourhood
- It is not anonymous. People actually know each other and say hello
- The communal garden at 50m from my house
- Café Congé: a hipster neighbourhood bar at 400m, in a small square with barely no cars and a lot of people on warm summer nights.
- Bakeries, butchers, nightshops, supermarkets & Pitta bars at 2-5 min walking distance
- For those who want to walk/run: we are 1 km away from "Bourgoyen"- a gorgeous & quiet nature reserve (google it!).
host_about:
I am a social justice activist who loves to bring people together. I love food, music, dancing, and of course my little boy. He is four - not the easiest phase - so I hope you’ll forgive him for the occasional outburst of anger. 

With work, a child and activism, my life is pretty busy. My home is my haven where I meet up with friends, relax and recharge.

description:
In a quiet green suburb just outside the medieval city centre, close to the nature reserve Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen. Busstop at 100 m. Nice bicycle routes into nature but also to the city centre. 2 bicycles available. The room has a pinball machine, fridge with deep-freeze, microwave, coffee- and tea facilities. Supermarket, backery and deli on walking/cycle distance. Ideal location for cycle tourists, motorcyclists, backpackers and any one who loves to combine both culture and nature.

The space
The room is very spacious and has lots of light. It is best compared with a studio. The quiet neighbourhood garanties a good night's rest. There is a pinball machine, lots of party games and comic books. On the ground-floor there is a private bathroom with walk-in shower. In the entrance hall is a large fridge with deep-freeze, a microwave, watercooker, coffee and tea, and sufficient glassware and cutlery. You can keep your own things cool and it is perfectly possible to pr
neighborhood_overview: Our location is the perfect start for a day of culture in the medieval city centre combined with a lovely bicycle tour in full nature.
host_about:
Gent is mijn geboortestad en daar ben ik fier op. Het is een stad met tal van mogelijkheden. Met mijn toerisme achtergrond help ik dan ook  graag een handje in het wegwijs maken van de talrijke to-do's. Mensen ontmoeten tijdens hun reistraject is steeds boeiend. 
Ghent is my hometown and I am really proud of it. It is a town with a variety of possibilities. With my tourism background I like helping people to find their way in the numerous to-do's. Meeting people during their trips I find very fascinating.

name: Room & ensuite bathroom near Ghent
description:
A cozy and sunny room with a double bed and an ensuite bathroom. My house is located by the river Scheldt in the outskirts of Ghent.

I offer you: a good bed, a private bathroom, wifi, towels, a hairdryer, a fridge, a smart TV, coffee/tea, blackout curtains...

And a big smile from me ;-)

The space
The room is fully furnished and equipped with all basic amenities with a smart TV. The room has a separate bathroom. You will also find a fridge in the room!

There are blackout curtains in the room so you can enjoy sleeping in for a long time!

There is free parking in the street.

Guest access
Toilet? You will find your private toilet in the hallway.

Other things to note
- I have two cute cats.

- The city of Ghent charges a tourist tax of € 2,83 per person, per night. This is not included in the price. I ask you to pay this cash at check-in, please.
neighborhood_overview:
I live in a very quiet residential area, close to the Scheldt. Everything can be found in the immediate vicinity: a department store (Lidl), a shop that is open 24/7 (Delhaize), a bakery, a laundromat, a pharmacy and a chip shop! A little further (500 meters) there are plenty of Turkish restaurants.
The city center of Ghent is a 30-minute walk, or 15 minutes by (night) bus. Free parking is available in front of the door.
host_about: Ik ben een prille veertiger, verzot van geschiedenis en stadsgids in Gent onder de naam “gids in Gent”. Daarnaast verslind ik boeken, doe ik veel culturele uitstappen en hou ik ervan de wereld te verkennen.

name: Rooftop apartment
description:
Modern rooftop apartment with a nice view, less than 2 km from the historic center of Ghent.

Free private parking along the building. a large bicycle shed. tram/bus stop are nearby.

Apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed. Large living room,equipped kitchen,bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.

And of course the large terrace ( 13m by 3,5m) with a beautiful view over the region. 14th floor in Ghent, there are only a few higher buildings.

The space
Apartment features 1 bedroom with double bed and large walk-in closet. power outlets along the bed.
Large living room with a comfortable sofa, wall cabinet, table with 2 chairs and an office chair.
Kitchen equipped with oven, hob, microwave, Senseo coffee maker, refrigerator and freezer. also most kitchen utensils are available such as pots, pans, cutlery, crockery and .....
Bathroom with shower, sink and toilet. also bath towels and toilet paper.
there is a lot

close to: public transport, supermarket, bakery, butcher, ATM, brasserie, restaurant, café, weekly Sunday market

name: Cosy, light vintage design appartment
description:
Our flat is a 5 min walk from Dampoort Station. At the station there is a bike rental service. You will find a great coffeeshop/breakfast place just around the corner. The centre is only a 10 min walk.
Our flat has 2 bedrooms but also a big sofabed in the livingroom.
If you like to go dancing you should go to Beestenmarkt or Vlasmarkt, also walking distance!
host_about: I'm a mother to 2 boys. My husband, my boys and I all live on this address in Gent. We have recently started hosting here on Airbnb, with some success. We always try to make our guests feel completely at home. We hope you will enjoy your stay as much as our previous guests!

name: Room 'Olga' - B&B Graaf.
description:
Graaf. is all about Belgian design. Don't think 'posh', but think 'creative' and get inspired by more than 30 designers! Our guests have access to a spacious and fully equipped kitchen. There is free Wi-Fi available. If you need extra info, please give us a call. We are happy to help.

Kenzo and Gwynn

The space
Olga was the former lady of the house. She loves green and ... more green! This room is located next to the spacious (and quiet!) patio. Your own rainshower and toilet are assured. Olga is waiting for you!

Check-in from 04.00 pm. Check-out before 11.00 am. On the day of departure you can leave your luggage in the hallway, so you can enjoy Ghent one more day without bags.

Breakfast
When we are on holidays, we like to dive into the city and have breakfast in one of the many breakfast shops. That's why breakfast is not included. So the choice is yours! If you are the kind of person who really needs breakfast before hitti
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the city center.
host_about:
Me and my husband Gwynn love to travel around the world and discovering new places. Since 2018 we started with our own B&B with a focus on 'think local' and Belgian design. In that way we are always surrounded with travel vibes. 

Kenzo & Gwynn

name: Flats with a soul, in the heart of Ghent.
description:
Ingrid and Luc have two luxury apartments for rent above their gallery. The apartments are situated in a fully restored nineteenth century house.
If you are a couple, a solo adventurer or someone who's travelling for work... our apartments are perfect!

The space
Luc and Ingrid Mestdagh-Meyvaert, who run Atelier Mestdagh, the oldest stained glass studio of Ghent, have two luxury apartments for rent above their gallery. The apartments are situated in a fully restored nineteenth century house. They each have a size of 50 m2 and are provided with all necessary conveniences and with design furniture.
Each apartment has a built-in kitchen with dining area (table with 4 chairs), a sitting corner, a fireplace, a toilet, a bedroom with double bed, a shower and a washing table.

Guest access
The two apartments for rent are above the gallery of Atelier Mestdagh. The entrance door is next to the window.

Other things to note</
neighborhood_overview:
The apartments are situated in Drabstraat 2 in the very heart of Ghent, above the Gallery of Kunstglasramen Mestdagh (Stained Glass Studio Mestdagh). From the front window you have a view on the Graslei and the Korenlei (the medieval port of Ghent) and on the boats which lie along the banks of the old harbour.
The Design museum is around the corner, just as the Gravensteen (the medieval Castle of the Counts), the Sint-Niklaaskerk (St Nicholas Church), the Belfry and many other places of interest.
In the neighbourhood there are many breakfast places restaurants, bars, but also bakers, butchers, department stores.

name: House with garden and pool near the city centre
description:
Our big and cosy familyhouse is situated in a quite neighbourhood. It’s 30min walk to the city centre of Ghent, but the bus also stops nearby and will take you to Dampoort station and the city centre. Grocery shops and bakery are nearby. Ideal for families with children, couples or people on a business trip. Enjoy discovering Ghent and relax in the house and garden afterwards! One little warning: the terrace near the biological non-heated swimmingpool is not finished yet.

Other things to note
This is the house we normally live in. We make sure that everything is tidy and clean, but be leave our books and other personal belongings in the house while we travel ourselves. Also one thing you should know: the terrace near our biological non-heated swimmingpool is not finished yet, but the garden is big enough and there are other terraces. There is no fence around the swimmingpool so you have to pay attention if you’re visiting with little children.

name: Cosy large room near centre and public transport.
description:
A nice renovated attic room. Very nearby the station and the city center.
Very quiet, cosy and clean.
There's a radio. You can make coffee and tea.
There's a lot of information about the city of Ghent and the area in the room.
Public transport, train, tram and bus are very nearby.
You can always rent bikes near the train station.
No breakfast, but a lot of good bakeries in the neighborhood. ;-)

The space
A nice renovated attic with a shared bathroom. (there's no lock for the bathroom, but the rule is when the door is closed there's someone in the bathroom.)

Guest access
Check in: just ring my bell.
Bathroom is shared.
You rent the room and share the bathroom, all other parts of the house are private. But you can use the fridge in the kitchen if you want.
My house is recently renovated. It just needs a paint everywhere (except your room).

Other things to note
PLEASE REA
neighborhood_overview: A dead-end street in a very quit residential neighborhood. Easy to walk (20 min) to the old city center, or to use any public transport.
host_about:
I'm a photographer and coach (solution focussed and NLP) who loves music, books, nature and culture and cooking.
I ‘d love to go more often to Scandinavie and Scotland and I'm dreaming of Japan, Iceland, Alaska,…
I also have a son of 13 years old. He’s very good in ping pong and playing the bass guitar.

name: Cosy room with King size bed
description:
You will stay in a stylish, cosy room with a king size bed on the 3rd floor of my house. My house is situated in a quiet street very close to Dampoort Station (4 min walk) and close to the city centre with all the touristic spots, musea, ...(15 min by foot).

In my neighbourhood there are also a few very nice breakfast, coffee and wine bars, as well as the best pizzeria in town :-).

The space
The room has a lot of light from the outside and there is a desk if you want to read, work or write.
The room is situated next to a large bathroom with a shower, 2 washbasins and toilet. The bathroom is shared with me.
Towels and sheets are provided.

On the ground floor you will find my kitchen that you can use if you want. There is a refridgerator, microwave, oven, ... and there is coffee :-)!

Your bikes can be sheltered inside.
host_about:
Hi! I'm Annelies. I'm a Ghent-based educational developer. I love (healthy) cooking, strolling around on flea markets, vintage design, ... .

I live in Ghent for about ten years, so I know a lot of nice places (bars, restaurants, parks, musea, concert halls, …). Feel free to ask for advice!

name: Heerlijke rustgevende studio vlakbij Gent-centrum
description:
Mijn ruimte is vlakbij het stadscentrum, station Dampoort, kunst en cultuur, parken en restaurants en eetgelegenheden. Je zult genieten van mijn plek vanwege de sfeer, de buitenruimte en het licht. Mijn ruimte is geschikt voor stellen, solo-avonturiers en zakelijke reizigers. Een koppel met max 2 kinderen kan ook. Voor 2 koppels is dit minder geschikt.

The space
De studio kenmerkt zich door veel licht en een rustgevende uitstraling. De keuken bevindt zich op de gelijksvloers, deze wordt occasioneel gedeeld met de kine-collega's die in de week hun koffietje komen halen in de week of hun lunch nuttigen bij slecht weer ( ongeveer 13u - 14u00 ) . Van vrijdag 16u00 tot maandagochtend 8u00 is dit niet het geval. De volledige bovenruimte ( zitruimte, bureaugedeelte, slaapkamer, badkamer) is volledig prive. De buitenruimte kan prima gebruik worden. Hier zitten ook , bij mooi weer, geregeld lieve patiënten te wachten ( niet van vrijdag 16u00 - maandag 08u00 )

name: Double room
description:
Our place is in an area next to the city center, in a neighborhood that was working-class, then multicultural and is being gentrified by young families who escape the high prices of the center (new park, new buildings, art gallery, museum). Note that this is not a fancy tourist area, but rather a neighborhood where one can get a authentic feel of living in Flanders. We love cooking and guests can join. We speak Dutch, French, English, German, Russian, Ukrainian, Greek, Italian and Spanish.

The space
We live in a simple house, we used to use the room for airbnb only, but now we use it as a work space during the week and offer it to guests on other days or when we don't need it. Please note that the room is on the 3rd floor, access via stairs which can be quite steep. It has been completely renovated. We have a double bed/couch in it, and an extra matress, if needed. The room is spacious and light and you can use the whole house, eg. kitchen, terrace with bbq etc.<
neighborhood_overview: Everything is close by, good transport, many shops, nice park area.

name: Apartment in the heart of the Historic Centre
description:
Beautiful, bright & quiet apartment in the heart of the Historic Centre at less than 200 yards from city highlights like the Belfry tower, the St. Bavo's Cathedral and the Gras- & Korenlei. Look outside the window and you will see the stunning St-Nicholas Church at your doorstep!

This is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food :-) of this amazing city.

Welcome to "Belle Epoque" - you will feel right at home in lovely Ghent!

The space
Apartment Belle Epoque is on the second floor of a beautiful building with a façade dating back to the end of the 19th century. It's registered as protected heritage.

The building is very centrally located: tram & bus stops at your doorstep, several car parks only 5 min. away, supermarket & groceries at less than 200 yards & lots of cultural, historic & culinary highlights within walking distance.

It is a very modern apartme
neighborhood_overview: This is a wonderful neighborhood to stay in.  You really can't imagine a better & more central location.  Everything is within walking distance: beautiful historical buildings, the cultural highlights, great restaurants, cosy bars & local shops - it's really Ghent at its best.  From the moment you come outside you will feel the energy and history of this beautiful city.  And at the apartment you will find a little city guide that I made for my guests to show you all the best that Ghent has to offer :-)
host_about:
Hi,

I'm Veerle from Ghent.  During college I spent a year in Costa Rica as part of a student exchange program.   I stayed in the house of a lovely family.  They were wonderfully hospitable and after a while I even called them my mammi, pappi & hermanas :-).  I really felt at home there.  I quickly realized how amazing it is to be able to have a home away from home.  Since then, when I travel I always look for a place to stay that gives me that same feeling.  And when my friends, family or you :-)  come to visit beautiful Ghent I try to offer that same kind of hospitality.

I hope to see you soon!

name: Just  feel@home in Ghent
description:
Welcome to our house, only a 20' walk away from the historical centre. Enjoy our home where you can completely relax after a long day of city tripping. There is plenty of natural light, an open kitchen and a south faced terrace. Our house is appropriate for couples, business travellers and families. Ghent is a city of art and culture, a culinary hotspot and a young and vibrant atmosphere. Nature park “de Bourgoyen” is less than 1km away. Everything is easily accessible with public transport.

Guest access
Garage voor fietsen beschikbaar, living en open keuken, badkamer, 2 slaapkamers, bureau/droogruimte voor de was als je dat wenst.
Open zolderruimte met veel licht en yogamat.
neighborhood_overview:
We maakten een persoonlijke (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)map aan met onze favoriete plekjes voor winkelen, lunch of brunch, restobezoek, interessante parken en markten en verrassende plaatsen in Gent.
We bezorgen deze aan al onze gasten.
host_about:
graag onderweg, genieten van de wereld verkennen, heel vaak op de fiets. 
We zijn graag in de stad, aan zee, of in de weidse natuur.  We trekken er geregeld een maand op uit per fiets, en bezochten op deze manier o.a. Cuba, Cambodia, Sri Lanka, Vietnam, Laos. 
We houden ook van onze eigen lokale streek en streekproducten, lekker eten, een goed muziekcafé en verwijzen je er met plezier naar door als je onze gast bent. 
We zijn een koppel vijftigers, een nieuw samengesteld gezin met 3 + 2 volwassen kinderen. 
We plannen om binnenkort voor een heel jaar op de fiets onderweg te zijjn, vertrekken aan onze voordeur, en zien waar de wind en Covid19 ons brengen. 
We zijn er van overtuigd dat de meeste mensen deugen, en dat gastvrijheid ook in de wereld mét Covid19 zal blijven bestaan, al zal het andere vormen aannemen.

name: Brand new private top floor in a travelers house!
description:
Recently renovated cosy quiet private bedroom, living room & bathroom in a nice neighborhood.
Close to the center by public transport, a beautiful nature reserve (De Bourgoyen) at 2 minutes walk & different shops at 10 minutes walk.
Our house is perfect for couples, solo travelers or business related travelers.
You can park your car for free in our street!

The space
We offer you a cosy, bright & quiet private bedroom & a separate living room at the top floor of our house. A private bathroom with bath & shower is situated at the second floor.
The bed can be used in different ways:
* a double bed for a couple or two guests
* 2 single beds, when you prefer single beds
Towels, soap & shampoo are included.

You are free to have a coffee/tea & water during your stay.
There's a microwave/oven (combi) in the living room where you can heat some food.
Long stay guests can use our kitchen (in consultation).
We apol
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a quiet neighborhood of Gent. Next to our house, at a walking distance of 5 minutes, there's a nature reserve, 'De Bourgoyen'.
Close to us (10 minutes walking), you can find some big shops (Colruyt, Aldi, Lidl, Carrefour,...) & a street with lots of small shops.
At the end of our street (2 min. walk) you can find a swimming pool.
There are 2 very nice pubs/restaurants at walking distance from our house (De Ganzerik & Café Congé).
host_about:
Willem and I are a very easy going & calm couple.
We are in our thirties. We live in a beautiful city, Gent.
We love to travel the world and meet local people. 
We don't smoke & we prefer a calm & relax place to stay.
We like to read, to watch some series, to talk about life,...

name: Edville studio Duplex A301  (2p-4p)
description:
Studio Edville Gent biedt verschillende studio's aan in twee verschillende gebouwen. Gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van het gezellige Gent. In de studio is een keukentje aanwezig met alle basisbenodigdheden, een badkamer met douche en toilet. Er is telkens een dubbelbed (160 cm) en een fouton met twee matrassen aanwezig. We voorzien beddengoed (100% linnen) en handdoeken. Het historische centrum ligt op 25 minuten wandelen. Dit is dé ideale plek om Gent te verkennen!

The space
- klein keukentje aanwezig met waterkoker, kookplaat, frigo, servies, bestek, glazen, koffie, ...
- eettafel met 2 stoelen en 2 bankjes
- zetel/fouton met salontafel (de zetel is omvormbaar tot 2 volwaardige bedden)
- dubbelbed (160 cm) gelegen op de mezzanine
- badkamer met douche, toilet en lavabo
- kledingkast met hangers
neighborhood_overview:
Studio Edville Gent is gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van Gent. Deze buurt staat bekend voor de gerenommeerde musea, SMAK, MSK en tal van andere kleine initiatieven. In de nabije buurt zijn er verschillende supermarkten, eetgelegenheden en cafés aanwezig. Er is een bakker om de hoek (ook open op zondag). Het oude historische gedeelte ligt op 20 minuten wandelafstand.

Het centrum van Gent is ook bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer. U kunt de buslijn 70 t.e.m. 79 nemen richting Gent Zuid, daar moet u overstappen op tram 1, deze tram rijdt steeds naar het centrum. U kunt afstappen aan de Korenmarkt, dan bent u vlak in het centrum. Deze rit duurt ongeveer 18 minuten.

Er is een bushalte op 200m van ons adres gelegen(Ter Platen Brug).
host_about:
We are Edward and Daphné, while traveling for our job we got to know airbnb. We love the concept and always have stayed in lovely places and met friendly people.
In the villa of my grandfather we started our adventure by renting out some beds, now we have 2 great locations. One is for big groups up to 32 persons just 5km of the center of Ghent and the other location are studio's in de center of Ghent. We love to share on airbnb. We love to meet new people and are sure you will love your stay with us.
We are an easygoing young couple and can give you lot's of information about the region, especially Ghent. 
We are working in our own company "ed", a baby and interior design studio. Our life motto is "every accomplishment starts with a dream"

description:
The apartment is located in a residential area and a quiet neighbourhood at walking distance from the city center. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Perfect for couples, friends or individual travelers. Possibility to stay with 3 guests (one comfortable sofa). Flexible check-in. The apartment is located in the city centre and is located very close to the city centre of Ghent.

The space
You enter the apartment in a modest hallway, providing on your left access to the kitech and on your right access living room.

The spatious and cosy living room has a big dinner table and comfortable sofa, central heating and lots of light coming through the large windows, which make it the perfect place to relax and enjoy your stay.

The kitchen is very convenient, containing enough kitchenware to make all types of meals. There's a nespresso machine, grill, toaster, water boiler, a percolator and much more.

neighborhood_overview: A very quiet neighbourhood, close to bars and restaurants, but no noisy students or tourists around. It's nearby a river where you can take a walk, but also extremely close to the city center.
host_about: Music lover, travel addict, Hanseatic city lover, wanderlust.

name: cozy studio in the canopy of trees center Ghent
description:
Onze studio met terrasje & vlakbij SUMMERBEACH in kruin van bomen gelegen in één van de mooiste culturele woonwijken vlakbij SMAK, MSK,UGENT,UZ en op wandelafstand (15 min) van het historisch centrum. Zeer rustig en mooi zicht op tuin.
Terras - living met zetelbed-smartTV-Gratis WIFI-eettafel-volledig uitgeruste keuken-dubbel bed-inloopdouche-toilet-lav-kleerkast-ed.
Als architect hebben wij de studio met de meeste zorg nieuw en gezellig ingericht met alle comfort voor een geslaagd verblijf.

The space
Onze gezellige studio met privé-terrasje is pas nieuw ingericht en kreeg een eigentijdse cosy look . De studio geniet van heel veel natuurlijk licht en een weids uitzicht op bomen en vijver.

Gezellige zithoek met zetelbed (2pers.) , bijzettafeltjes, buffetkast met smart-tv, eettafel , kleerkast met diverse kleerhangers, tweepersoonsbed( 160 cm breed) inclusief opgemaakt bed , werktafel/bureau.
Gratis wifi.

Een volledig uit
neighborhood_overview: Onze studio is gelegen in een residentiële buurt , waar alles aanwezig is wat je nodig zou hebben tijdens je verblijf : een warme bakker om de hoek, een supermarkt op 50m (Spar)& 100m(ProxyDelhaize 7/7) , een nachtwinkel,  gezellige restaurantjes , een apotheek, mooie parken, een shoppingcenter, een cinemacomplex, de mooiste musea van Gent (en Belgie) nl. het SMAK, MMSK, STAM, ... en zelfs een zwembad en een stadsstrand (100m)  met leuke optredens in de zomermaanden .
host_about: Ik ben architect en hou van reizen , nieuwe mensen ontmoeten, mooie dingen in het leven kunnen delen met anderen .

name: Stylish apartment @ heart historic Ghent!
description:
Volledig vernieuwd, historisch pand van 1551. Ruim (110 m²)appartement met zonnig terras, ingericht met passie voor interieur. Gelegen vlakbij het Gravensteen-kasteel, St. Baafskathedraal met Lam Gods (Altarpiece), Korenmarkt, ... ideaal voor cultuur, shopping, restaurants, bars , .... Alles op loopafstand.
Heel leuk adres om te vertoeven voor vakantie of werk , combinatie van rust en stad.

The space
Gezellige leefruimte met zonnig terras - volledig uitgeruste keuken (Nespresso-koffiezet !). Vanuit de leefruimte mooie gang naar de 2 slaapkamers en badkamer met ligbad/douche. Cosy TV-kamer met slaapbank 140 cm (= derde slaapkamer). High-speed Wifi en Sonos-geluidsinstallatie.
Handdoeken, lakens , shampoo en zeep zijn voorzien.
Appartement is zeer rustig (en toch pal in het historisch centrum)!

Guest access
Het appartement is volledig ter beschikking van de gasten en is gelegen op het tweede verdiep (brede trap).
Gesch
neighborhood_overview:
Hartje historisch Gent , aan de rand van Patershol met tal van restaurants, koffiebars, shops.
Ook centrale ligging voor bezoek aan Antwerpen, Brussel,Brugge.

name: Romantic apartment at the Opera House
description:
Lovely 1 bedroom apartment right in the city center of Ghent with a view of the Opera house. Located at 250m from the historical center of Ghent and a 15 minute walk from the central station. Below the apartment is a charming breakfast place.

The space
The apartment is located right in the city center right across the Opera of Ghent! It is easily accessible with public transport. If you walk 2 minutes through the shopping street you will find yourself standing between 2 of the iconic church towers of Ghent.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours! You will have access to a spacious living room with a nice couch, and lots of light. There is also a big table where you can work or have breakfast. There is a Bluetooth speaker if you like to have some background music. Furthermore there is a nice 2 person bed, a separate toilet and a nice kitchen where you can prepare some basic recipes.

PS: don't forget to check the fridge for a
neighborhood_overview: Ghent is pretty small and we are right in the center but easily accessible with public transportation and by car!

name: Great penthouse including beer tasting package!
description:
Two spacious floors in a comfortable house near the center of Ghent. Ideal for an unforgettable weekend with family or friends. (max 10 pp) Very charming is also the visit to the beautiful city brewery Gruut with local beer tasting. Included in the price! IN the house are two kitchens, a bathroom and spacious bedrooms. Sheets and towels are provided.

The spirit of the house is a writer and occasionally stays on the ground floor. She loves light and decoration with a story.

The space
The rooms available to guests are located on the first, second and third floors. The rooms are ready and spacious: 250 m2 in total!

2nd floor:
bedroom with 1 double bed
bedroom with 1 double bed and 1 single bed
bedroom with two single beds and kitchen
bathroom
3rd floor:
spacious attic with a double bed and possibly up to 2 extra sleeping places in the comfortable pull-out sofa bed
kitchenette
seating area

Near
neighborhood_overview: It is impossible to get bored in Ghent. It is a beautiful and welcoming city. Your stay will be made even more unique by the visit (with tasting!) to the beautiful city brewery GRUUT, a ten-minute walk from our beautiful house.

Cozy shared house at the water. Close to nature (Bourgoyen) & center. name: Edville Family Duplex A302 (2p-4p)
description:
Edville family duplex is located by the water in the art district of cosy Ghent. The studio has a kitchenette with all basic necessities, a bathroom with shower and toilet. There is a double bed (160 cm), single bed and a fouton with two mattresses. We provide bed linen (100% linen) and towels. The historic centre is a 25-minute walk away.
Studio has been completely renovated with ecological products giving it a very warm feel.

The space
- small kitchenette with kettle, hob, fridge, crockery, cutlery, glasses, coffee, etc.
- dining table with 4 chairs

- double bed (160 cm) and a single bed located on the mezzanine
- bathroom with shower, toilet, and washbasin
- wardrobe with hangers

Check-in via key box

name: Edville Studio A102
description:
Studio Edville Gent biedt verschillende studio's aan in twee verschillende gebouwen. Gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van het gezellige Gent. In de studio is een keukentje aanwezig met alle basisbenodigdheden, een badkamer met douche en toilet. Er is telkens een dubbelbed (160 cm) en een fouton met twee matrassen aanwezig. We voorzien beddengoed (100% linnen) en handdoeken. Het historische centrum ligt op 25 minuten wandelen. Dit is dé ideale plek om Gent te verkennen!

The space
- klein keukentje aanwezig met waterkoker, kookplaat, frigo, servies, bestek, glazen, koffie, ...
- eettafel met 2 stoelen en 2 bankjes
- zetel/fouton met salontafel (de zetel is omvormbaar tot 2 volwaardige bedden)
- dubbelbed (160 cm)
- badkamer met douche, toilet en lavabo
- kledingkast met hangers
neighborhood_overview:
Studio Edville Gent is gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van Gent. Deze buurt staat bekend voor de gerenommeerde musea, SMAK, MSK en tal van andere kleine initiatieven. In de nabije buurt zijn er verschillende supermarkten, eetgelegenheden en cafés aanwezig. Er is een bakker om de hoek (ook open op zondag). Het oude historische gedeelte ligt op 20 minuten wandelafstand.

Het centrum van Gent is ook bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer. U kunt de buslijn 70 t.e.m. 79 nemen richting Gent Zuid, daar moet u overstappen op tram 1, deze tram rijdt steeds naar het centrum. U kunt afstappen aan de Korenmarkt, dan bent u vlak in het centrum. Deze rit duurt ongeveer 18 minuten.

Er is een bushalte op 200m van ons adres gelegen(Ter Platen Brug).
host_about:
We are Edward and Daphné, while traveling for our job we got to know airbnb. We love the concept and always have stayed in lovely places and met friendly people.
In the villa of my grandfather we started our adventure by renting out some beds, now we have 2 great locations. One is for big groups up to 32 persons just 5km of the center of Ghent and the other location are studio's in de center of Ghent. We love to share on airbnb. We love to meet new people and are sure you will love your stay with us.
We are an easygoing young couple and can give you lot's of information about the region, especially Ghent. 
We are working in our own company "ed", a baby and interior design studio. Our life motto is "every accomplishment starts with a dream"

name: Oasis of Ghent
description:
If you like to stay in the city, but at the same time have a quiet place to reside, then this is for you.
You can go to the center of Ghent on foot, by tram or bus.
The studio is very private. Own entrance to the street and has a nice terras in the garden. Own bathroom and kitchenette.

The space
The studio is located on the ground floor of the house that is communicating with the main house through the garden. So it is cosy and private. With own entrance, bathroom and kitchenette. No stairs. Bed is 140/200.

Guest access
You have your own terras in front of the studio.
The rest of the garden is usable on invitation

Other things to note
In my place I only use bio-products to clean, to build, to eat. So I keep the house vegetarian and without smoking. You can use the garden to smoke if you like.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located on the outer region of Ghent. So it has the advantage of being close to the city, but at the same time it has a bit a village feeling. Big marked on sunday, multicultural shops, easy to get out or into the city. 25 minutes on foot, 10 with bicycle. Nature nearby.
host_about: I am a woman with three grown up children. So now I like to share my beautiful house with fine people. For me it is important to surround me with beauty, lovely people, good food, and be in touch with nature. Meditation is  also important in my life. When we live consciously and with love, life is great!

name: Captains room on Riverboat with riverview
description:
Set within 2 km from the historical center of Ghent, B³ Bed & Breakfast Boat provides guest cabins with a private terrace and free access to wireless internet. The Belfry of Ghent, the Korenlei, Korenmarkt Square and the Castle of the Count are all within a 15-minute walk.

The furnished cabins comprise a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Free coffee and tea facilities as well as a fridge are available. A shower, towels and free toiletries come as a standard in the bathroom.

Other things to note
A boat is not always easy to access for all people...

name: Bright room + bathroom in THE HEART OF GHENT <3
description:
Spacious and bright room in the heart of Ghent. You have an adjoining bathroom with a shower, sink and toilet. Our bright and green home is a perfect base for wandering around in the most beautiful city, Ghent. We deliver you the best addresses and the most beautiful places. Don't miss the coffee bar of our cheerful neighbors! Who lives here? Me, Simon and Facie (our sweet cat).
If it fits our workschedule, we can offer you a small breakfast.

The space
Downstairs you will find our cozy living room and kitchen with a small patio. Simon and I sleep at the first floor. On the second floor you can find your room, toilet and bathroom.
neighborhood_overview: Our house is located in the middle of a reviving neighborhood where many families live, but where nice restaurants / cafes are also popping up. You are a stone's throw from the historic city center (10m walk), the beautiful waterways (5m walk) and the old docks (10m) where you can get a breath of fresh air and check out some graffiti-art.

name: Paparazzo - Ghent (city center)
description:
Paparazzo is a one bedroom apartment in the very city centre of Ghent. It's entirely decorated by owner & photographer Filip Naudts whose work is on show on the web.
You can buy his prints that are exposed in the apartment!

CORONA SAFE:
No contact with the host needed.
You can enter the apartment with your personal code.

Guest access
Couples or friends looking for the perfect location to visit the centre of Ghent. This place is most popular amongst art and photography lovers.
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement is gelegen in het stadscentrum.
host_about:
Born in Ghent, I grew up very nearby, in Lochristi, where I founded my own photostudio and where I still live today. Currently I'm a photographing artist, working additionally for Belgian press. In my work I focus on portraiture as I need the interaction with people. That's also why I decided to start-up this tourist apartment which is popular amongst art and photography lovers.

For more info: enter 'filip naudts' in your browser ;)

name: Renovated triplex in the city centre of Ghent
description:
Renovated triplex in the city centre of Ghent, 10 minutes walking from the historic city. In a very quiet neighborhood.
On the first floor is a kitchen.
On the second floor is the living area. The sofa turns into a bed for 1 person.
On the third floor you will find a double bed for 2 persons.
2 separate toilets and a shower.

The space
Perfect location to discover the city. Easy to reach by car. Parking possibility in the street (with parking fee). Tram is 150m away. Bus is 400m away.
Important points of interest are within walking distance.

name: Completely renovated 19th century family house
description:
Our house, completely loft-like renovated in 2017, is situated in a quiet historic neighborhood in the lovely city of Ghent. With my 2 young daughters (5 and 7 years) our house is baby/kids-friendly, and it's a great place to live: 200m² of living area, close to the city center, but still easy to travel to other places. We don't have a garden, but a big roof terrace, a park with a play ground 25m away, good access to public transport, ...

The space
I bought this house a couple of years ago, and renovated the outside of it like it used to be in the 19th century. The inside was turned around completely.

Downstairs:
- bathroom
- toilet
- kids bedroom (2 small beds)
- kids bedroom (2 foldable beds + 1 baby bed) / study room

Level 1:
- living room + dining room + kitchen

Level 2:
- master bedroom (double bed, Tempur mattresses!)
- bathroom
- roof top terrace

Note: some pictures show ca
neighborhood_overview:
Very calm neighbourhood, with a nice mixture of young families, and older people. There is a park with a play ground 25m away, good access to public transport, art deco swimming pool, ...

Inside the city of Ghent, this neighbourhood is the last one where people started to build houses. these were all workers houses. In the 19th century the famous architect Jacob Gustaaf Semey was requested to increase the appearance of the neighbourhood, hence he designed a couple of houses. Our house was one of these.
host_about: 2 young daughters

name: Private studio near city center
description:
The studio has a double bed, sleeper sofa, TV with Netflix, private bathroom and kitchen. There is a separate entrance and access to the shared garden (BBQ available). Easy to reach by car, public transportation or taxi. Located in a quiet area, just outside the city center (10 min by bus or bike, 3 bikes available). Walking distance of beautiful nature reserve the Bourgoyen. Close to supermarkets, bars and restaurants (brunch, lunch, diner, take away, ...).

The space
The private studio with seperate entrance includes kitchen, bathroom with shower and toilet, dubble bed, sofa(bed), TV with Netflix and entrance to the shared garden.
Two minutes walk from café with small dishes and brunch on saterday and sunday. Also walking distance from dinner take-away (Chinese food, Belgian fries, grill,...) , naturepark 'Bourgoyen' and busstop to city center(every 5min)

Guest access
You have acces to the shared garden with BBQ.
If wanted you
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is located in a quiet residential area in Brugse Poort / Rooigem, just outside the city center.
A five minute walk takes you to the unique open landscape of the Bourgoyen, which is perfect for birdwatching, walking or a run.

If you come by car, the central location has a good connection to all major highways and there is free parking in front of the studio.
If you come by train, you can reach the studio by bus and a short walk. There is a fast connection by bus to the city center and we have bikes available.
