name: Family home in center of Ghent
description:
Our family house is located in the city center, just at the border of the historical center. There are a few parks and a lot of bars/restaurants. Everything in the center is on walking distance, but stil in a very quiet residential area, ideal for families (with children), couples or business travelers.

We prefer not to rent to groups... our home is locaties in a residential area and we value the good relationship we have with our neighbours.

The space
+00: entrance, dining room, playroom, place with washing machine and dryer, kitchen and city garden.

+01: Living room, bathroom and bedroom with double bed.

+02: Children's bedroom 1 (1 single bed, 1 cot and if desired a double mattress), Children's bedroom 2 (1 cot)
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is cozy, yet vibrant. Our street is a residential area and is not intended for passing traffic.

During the Ghent festivities (Gentse Feesten), this is the ideal base: the festivities within walking distance and yet quiet.

Ik ben getrouwd met Liefke en samen hebben we twee kinderen.

name: authentic spacious apartement in historic centre
description:
Huize Maeterlinck is een prachtig gerenoveerd appartement in hartje Gent. Het maakt deel uit van een groter pand dat werd gerenoveerd met oog voor detail en waar verrassende elementen een eigenzinnig geheel vormen. Dit pand was het voormalige huis van de familie Maeterlinck. Gelegen in het autovrije gebied is dit de perfecte uitvalbasis om Gent te ontdekken. Op wandelafstand van Vrijdagmarkt, Korenmarkt, Graslei en het Gravensteen en toch in een zeer rustige wandelstraat, een absolute aanrader.

The space
Appartement op 1ste verdieping
4 zeer zonnige, grote en luchtige ruimtes met originele parketvloer, open haard, smaakvol ingericht met hoogwaardige materialen afgewerkt, keuken, badkamer en groot terras. Een streling voor het oog.
neighborhood_overview:
Huize Maeterlinck ligt midden in het centrum, in autovrije zone.
Alles is op 5 minuten afstand. De straat is zeer rustig, gelegen aan de Vrijdagsmarkt... toffe cafés en bars in de buurt met alle voorzieningen voor de bewoners van het centrum.

The location on the map is not correct : check location photo.

Welcome in my cosy house in Gent. I have 2 rooms on the second floor available for guests. The stairs towards the second floor is steep so be careful. Breakfast is not included, but feel free to make your own breakfast in the kitchen. The house is located close to the city center. You can get there by tram, bike or on foot. The space
The rooms are located on the second floor, under the roof. the stairs to the second floor is steep, so be careful when you come down. The bathtub is not accesible for guests. Breakfast is not included, but you can use anything in the kitchen to make your own. Guest access
Guests have access to their room, the bath

description:
Welcome to a private room located close to the city centre.

The bedroom has an old-time three-quarter bed, wardrobe, extra cupboard with mirror, desk and single sofa bed.

If for a special reason you need to use the kitchen, for example only for breakfast or to have some space in the fridge, let me know, I'll see what I can do. It depends if I'm home myself or not.

I'm a warm he

The appartment is on the first floor and has a big lightfull living room and a private terrace. Wherever you look, in the almost car free centre of the city, you see buildings or monuments with a story. A castle of more then a thousand years old, 3 midevil towers , the most beautiful rows of old houses seperated by the ' leie' (river). A real eyecatcher at evenings.

name: Charming 3 Bedroom on the Canal Near the City
description:
We are a 20 minute walk to the Gravensteen (center of town) or a 5 min bus ride. The neighborhood is quiet, with ample (paid) street parking (2-3 euros per 24H) paid by bank card. Have a cup of coffee on the balcony, while watching the bikers passing by. The #3 bus is behind our block. After a long day exploring Gent, relax with a movie on our projector!

The space
We are on the 3rd floor, there is an elevator up to our place. The kitchen is fully stocked with pots and pans and all the utensils you'll need to cook a delicious meal! We have a dishwasher too for the aftermath.
Please enjoy any of the food products or spices that are in our cabinets.
We provide coffee, tea and sugar. There is a projector in the living room, enjoy Netflix/YouTube or DVD’s from our Apple TV and PS3, no cable TV provided.
Our place has balconies on the front side of the building and the back. 2 of the 3 bedrooms have balcony access.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet but the street behind us (Bevrijdingslaan) offers a supermarket, fruit/vegetable markets and restaurants.

name: Bed Resort - Belfort
description:
Bed Resort - Belfort is een design appartement, gelegen in het hart van het historische Gent-centrum, met zicht op de Sint-Jacobskerk aan het einde van de Belfortstraat.

Op wandelafstand van station Gent-Dampoort, dicht bij alle toeristische attracties, fietsverhuur en zeer goede verbinding met het openbaar vervoer.

Honger of dorst? Vlakbij vindt u tal van horeca zaken en supermarkten.

Het appartement is voorzien van alle modern comfort: wifi, kabeltelevisie, volledig ingerichte keuken.

The space
Bed Resort - Belfort is een volledig gerenoveerd design-appartement in een residentieel gebouw (respect voor onze buren is een must). De maximale capaciteit is 2 volwassenen.

Er is 1 slaapkamer met 2 éénpersoonsbedden (die ook samen gevoegd kunnen worden tot één groot tweepersoonsbed), een volwaardige keuken, grote eettafel en zithoek met TV, een badkamer met toilet, lavabo en douche, WiFi en kabeltelevisie.

De r
neighborhood_overview:
Aan marktjes en ander vertier zeker geen tekort hier in het levendige centrum. Van vrijdag- t.e.m. zondagvoormiddag is er wekelijks Prondelmarkt (tweedehands en brocante) aan de Sint-Jacobskerk, op zondag Bloemenmarkt op de Kouter, lekker eten inkopen op de Vrijdagmarkt ...

Restaurantjes en snackbars bij de vleet, winkels en boetieks vlakbij! Ben je op zoek naar een leuke stadswandeling dan verwijzen we je graag naar visit gent. Een selectie van onze favoriete wining en dining spots, stadsplan en andere toeristische informatie vindt u in de infomap op het appartement.
host_about: Ik ben zelf centrum bewoner van de stad Gent. Tevens ben ik zaakvoerder van café Charlatan op de Vlasmarkt, op 50m van Band en Bed Resort.

We have renovated our attic into a studio flat. It has a kitchenette, bathroom, sitting area, and a bed on the mezzanine. People from all backgrounds are welcome. Possibility to accomodate 3rd person upon request.

The space
Recently renovated. The dinette (14m2), sitting area (14m2) and mezzanine are connected areas. It has a separate bathroom (5m2) which includes a shower, toilet and washbasin. description:
*The 4 single beds have been replaced by two double beds, pictures will be updated soon*

- Beautiful townhouse with grand staircase, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Completely renovated in the past year.
- Large south-facing balcony
- Excellent location in the city center (Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)

The space
You will be staying in a beautiful 18th century townhouse that has been completely renovated in the past year. The high ceilings, large windows and hardwood floors make the place feel very spacious with a lot of natural light. The grand wooden staircase takes you back to the luxury days of Ghentian nobility...

You also have a large, sunlit, south-facing balcony all to yourself!

In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the la
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

description:
Enjoy a stay in a luxury decorated suite with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a romantic waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre

The space
The suite is situated on the first level, above the Frou Frou bar. It has a private terrace with water side view. The suite has a queen size or twin bed, a lounge area with writing desk and kitchenette.

neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays, all warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour is now one of the biggest protected city views of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.

name: Vintage studio
description:
Deze centraal gelegen accommodatie is smaakvol ingericht. Volledig nieuw! Veel comfort. Super gezellig. Volledig uitgeruste keuken. Ook een leuk tuintje. Waar je gebruik van kunt maken. Is privé voor de huurder. Je kan er veilig je fietsen plaatsen.

The space
Leuke living. Heel praktische keuken met oven en kookplaat inductie. In de slaapkamer staat er een bureau waar je ook kunt werken

Guest access
Tram 4 & 1 komen van het station. Halte korenmarkt of de kouter. Beide heel dichtbij het huisje. De turrepoortsteeg is een doodlopend straatje. Het is het laatste huisje op je linkerkant. Heel zonnig. Je kan met geen auto in het steegje.
Als je met de fiets bent kan je deze binnen in het binnentuintje plaatsen.

Parking nabijgelegen: Sint-Michielsparking (23 euro per dag, zondagen 4euro)

Other things to note
We werken ook met locker locker. Maar we verwachten graag onze gasten op vaste uren.

name: 120m2 Private house with big terrace
description:
8 minuten fietsen naar het historisch centrum, via de nieuw aangelegde fietsstraten. Alsook vlotte tramverbinding naar centrum
Het huis omvat een ruime living, met volledig ingerichte keuken. Een ruim zonneterras, volledig in hout.
Verder is er een authentieke badkamer met bad.
Op het tweede verdiep is er de slaapkamer, met een kingsize bed.
Op zondag is de grootste markt van gent op 300 m hier vandaan
Afrit gent op 500m.

Opgelet: steile trap tussen verdiepen

The space
Our house is only 8 minutes by bike to the historical centre, you can enjoy the new bike friendly lanes. You can also take a tram to the city center, tramstop is a 5 min walk from the house.

The house has a large living room, equipped kitchen, nice outdoors terrace with a lot of sun, and an authentic bathroom On the second floor there's a large bedroom with kingsize bed.

name: Bright and Comfortable ROOM on the Canal
description:
THIS LISTING IS FOR 1 ROOM IN OUR APARTMENT.
SHARED KITCHEN, BATHROOM, LIVING SPACES.
Our apartment is situated on a canal with an active bike path right outside and balconies to enjoy the view. 1-2 guests will share the large bedroom with 1 Queen bed.

Our kitchen, living room and bathroom are available to you to share with us.

We work from home but you will have your privacy if you wish to enjoy a movie or games in our living room.

The space
We have a projector in the living room that you may use whenever you like. After 10pm, we just ask that you keep the volume at a medium level.

Guest access
You will have your own private bedroom and you may use the kitchen and living room as you like, as well as the washing machine and dryer.
neighborhood_overview:
The city center is a 15/20 minute walk from our place and there is a bus that can take you to the center in 3 stops (about 7 minute ride).
There is a Carrefour supermarket within a 5 minute walk from our place. We offer a shopping cart for you for easy carrying of groceries, etc.
host_about: I love to travel and do so with my husband, Dieter. We treat your home just like we would our own and love to live like locals! We now also host our home in Gent!

name: B&B Schopenhauer in the historical centre of Ghent
description:
B&B Schopenhauer is situated in the picturesque historical centre of Ghent and consists of two beautiful suites with both a different atmosphere.

The Schopenhauer suite - In this romantically red suite you will be surrounded by art from young talents as well as more established artists. Spacious and bright.

The Athma Room - Time to relax, beautiful room with private hammam. This room has a little private garden with seating area and outside shower.

description:
> Renovated house near the center of Ghent

The house is part of a renovation project dating from 2015 which turned an office and warehsoue facility of a wholesaler in electrical equipment into 3 modern houses with loft style high sealing and open living spaces on the bottom floor. All aplliances and furniture date from that renovation so they up-to-date with modern living.

The house

name: Unique apartment with a view in centre of Ghent
description:
This unique located mansion on the waterfront is just across the Baudolohof , near 'St. Jacobskerk' , the 'vlasmarkt' and the vrijdagsmarkt . A few meters further you will find the city hall, the korenmarkt and all the fun that this lively city has to offer.

The space
Our appartment is on the first floor of the old Lockman's house. The lock is the only Lock in Ghent that is manually controlled. From the appartement you have a beautifull view over the water and the parc. We just finished renovating. It has high and bright rooms with a lot of natural light. It has an big living space, dining room and kitchen. The bathroom is connected to the bedroom and has an open shower.

Guest access
You have acces to all the areas on the first floor.
If wanted, you can also use the second bathroom on the groundfloor or the third toilet on the second floor.

Other things to note
From the 13th until the 22nd of July, It is 'Gentse
neighborhood_overview: The direct neighbourhood is the historical city center. name: Unieke woonboot in centrum Gent 4 - 6 personen
description:
Eerst en vooral: welkom in Gent. Wil je de stad op een andere manier ontdekken en mag het allemaal net iets spannender en avontuurlijker zijn in een uniek kader? Dan nodig ik je graag uit op woonboot Luctor; een Deens vrachtschip uit 1928.

The space
Een boot is net iets anders dan een huis. Eerst en vooral zijn er bijzonder veel trappen en opstapjes. Houd hier zeker rekening mee als je niet goed te been bent. De 2 slaapkamers zijn gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Indien je gebruik wenst te maken van de derde slaapkamer, dan bespreek je dit vooraf met mij.

Je bent niet alleen op een boot. Ik tracht ongewenste bezoekers zoals spinnen en muggen zoveel mogelijk buiten te houden maar weet dat die heel graag op en rond de Luctor hangen.

Een boot gaat mee op het ritme van de seizoenen. In de winter is het kouder, in de zomer is het warmer. Een boot ligt in een vochtige omgeving. In combinatie met warmte kan dit condens geven.

De boot zelf ligt

name: Cosy studio at the Opera
description:
Lovely 1 bedroom studio right in the city center of Ghent with a view of the Opera house. Located at 250m from the historical center of Ghent and a 15 minute walk from the central station.

The space
The apartment is located right in the city center right across the Opera of Ghent! It is easily accessible with public transport. If you walk 2 minutes through the shopping street you will find yourself standing between 2 of the iconic church towers of Ghent. Important to note is that the apartment is on the fourth floor without an elevator.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours! You will have access to a spacious living room with a nice couch, and lots of light. There is also a big table where you can work or have breakfast. Furthermore there is a nice 2 person bed, a separate toilet and a nice kitchen where you can prepare some basic recipes.

PS: don't forget to check the fridge for a nice little surprise!

Other
neighborhood_overview: Ghent is pretty small and we are right in the center but easily accessible with public transportation and by car! (In January 2017 Ghent changed a lot of the streets so make sure your GPS is updated!)

name: HELENA's Cabin
description:
"An island in Ghent, sleeping on the water!"
Are you looking for something unique on the water, a touch of history touch combined with view on the 'Handelsdok' - in full development.
'Helena's Cabin' is the former skipper accomodation & is smaller sister of 'Helena's Boathouse'. Besides visiting Ghent, in our B&B you can cosily browse through the many art books or relax with a good read. You can also enjoy a range of fine wines.
Enjoy on and off the water!
#sleepbetteronthewater

* Upstairs in the wheelhouse you have a small kitchennette, ideal to warm up small dishes or to make a nice breakfast. There is a fridge, 1 hotplate and coffee (nespresso)/tea.
* Downstairs in the cabin you have a cozy living room with a comfortable closet bed and a bathroom alcove with a lovely bath.
* Outside, on the aft deck you can enjoy the sun and people strolling by.
* The wheelhouse is accessible via a separate entrance.
* In the
neighborhood_overview: 'HELENA's Cabin is located in the future neighbourhood 'De Nieuwe Dokken' (The New Docks) in the city’s harbour with the concrete plant and the cranes as historical beacons, nearby Dampoort station and close to the beauty of the Centre of Ghent.

name: Gustav's House. A trendy spot to work, love & play
description:
Gustav's House.
A renovated (2018), fully furnished, well situated, cosy and trendy house, next to the beautiful river Leie, with spacious private garden, sunny terrace and private parking (2 cars). Electric car charging station and 6 bikes available. BBQ. Stay in a quiet and green 'hot spot'. Wake up with bird-songs, feel at home, relax, work, play ... and discover Ghent within 10 minutes by car, bike or rent a boat next door (in summer months). Close to Bruges, Antwerp & Brussels. Enjoy !

The space
Gustav's features & comfort ? Free WiFi. LCD TV. Play your own music on our surround system (sonos). Hairdryer. Laundry facilities. Iron & ironing board. Vacuum cleaner. Cleaning service. Baby’s things. Gustav likes cooking. Fridge. Multifunctional oven and microwave. Kettle & coffee-machine (senseo). Dishwasher. Mixer. Waffle maker. Toaster. Comprehensive set of cutlery, dishes, glasses ...

Guest access
Enjoy the entire house and your pr
neighborhood_overview: Supermarket, bakery (a very good one !), butcher, ATM-machines, pharmacy, lingeriestore ;-), pubs, restaurant, ... all within a 100 meter walk. Go relaxing in the nearby and biggest nature reserve 'Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen' or go for a walk along the magnificent river Leie.

name: Niet beschikbaar voor groepen onder 8 personen.
description:
Moderne hostel met 8 kamers met telkens 2 stapelbedden (plaats voor 32 personen) voor groepen vanaf 8 personen die voor een sportieve of culturele activiteit naar Gent komen. Twee sanitaire ruimtes, 1 voor mannen, 1 voor vrouwen. Relaxruimte met zetel en televisie. Kleine ruimte voor ontbijt, maar deze ruimte is niet geschikt om er met grote groepen te zitten. Eén ruimte met tafel en stoelen, frigo, waterkoker, ... waar je ontbijt kunt maken, maar niet met grote groepen kunt zitten.

Twee sanitaire ruimtes, één voor mannen, één voor vrouwen.
Mogelijkheid tot het huren van een lakenpakket voor € 5 extra per persoon (te betalen bij aankomst). (als je geen lakens huurt, vragen wij een slaapzak, kussensloop en onderlaken mee te brengen)

name: Quiet family house in a unique car-free street
description:
Our house is situated in a quiet, green, car-free street. We have a little garden and roof terrace. In summer time children play outside and there's a unique atmosphere. We have lot's of supermarkets nearby, a few superbe cafés where you can have a drink and a meal. It's a 15 min. walk to get to the city centre. There's a bus nearby or 3 bikes at your disposal. Our house is perfect for couples or families. We only rent the place when we're out ourselves so you have to live with our stuff ;-)

The space
Our house has everything you need: a good kitchen, a nice livingroom, a piano, tv, a bathroom with bath and rainshower, a little garden with a bbq, swings for the children, toys and games for children, netflix, bikes to use, a quiet roof terrace and a little library.
We have a cat, Winnie. She likes to be fed, but she can stay outside in spring/summer/autumn if you have a cat allergy.

Guest access
Guests can use al spaces.
neighborhood_overview: We live about 15 minutes walk (2 km) from the city centre. Our neighbourhood is calm, has lots of supermarkets and some nice cafés around the corner. There's a natural domain in 5 min. walking and a swimming pool nearby.

name: Volop ruimte en romantische accenten in een historisch pand in hartje Gent
description:
Trek eropuit met familie of vrienden en geniet van de rust en ruimte van dit stijlvol gerenoveerde pakhuis in het historische centrum van Gent. Ga lekker loungen in de woonkamer of gezellig kokkerellen in de goed uitgeruste keuken. En alles is privé.

The space
Het GELIJKVLOERS bestaat uit een gezellige ruimte met volledig uitgeruste open keuken.(koelkast, diepvriezer, gasfornuis, microgolf, oven, vaatwasser, borden, bestek, glazen...)
Hier bevindt zich ook een aparte studio met een queen-size bed, een zithoek met open haard en bureau. Op het gelijkvloers is de toegang tot de ruime badkamer met ligbad, dubbele wastafelen inloopdouche met een apart toilet.
Op het EERSTE VERDIEP heb je een ruime living (100m2) met open haard en toegang tot het terras.
De zolderruimte is een gezellige open ruimte van 100m2, met 2 king-size bedden, 1 eenpersoonsbed en op de mezzanine 1 queen-size bed; ligbad en 2 lavabo's.
De bedden zijn door middel van een wand;
neighborhood_overview: De woning is rustig gelegen maar toch vlakbij het bruisende oude stadscentrum met vele bezienswaardigheden zoals de Sint-Baafskathedraal, het Sint-Jacobs en het Design Museum. Goed bereikbaar per openbaar vervoer en met een parking op 300 meter.

name: Design Apartment with Balcony and View over Ghent Towers
description:
All guests have a private apartment, there is 1 apartment per level. So there is a lot of privacy.
Downstairs we have a laundry, which you can use.
We have a chocolate atelier, where you are always welcome !

The setting is immediately adjacent to the city's famous Graffiti Street. A tasting in the chocolate studio below is a must, after which stroll to some of Ghent's many boutiques, and perhaps the weekend antiques market in nearby St Jacob's Square.

From the railway station, you take the MAIN tram line no 1 to the city centre, we are at 300m from the stop GRAVENSTEEN (castle)

Guest access

description:
Charming Garden Studio in the old historic city center

The space
Find peace and tranquility right in the historic center of "patershol". This unique location is at a few hundred meters from the castle "gravensteen" but still accessible by car if needed to unload your luggage. Excellent connection from the train station. Everything at walking distance. This studio is something really special !

name: Inge's Studio in centre Ghent
description:
Welcome in my spacious studio in the historic centre of Ghent. The train station of Ghent Dampoort is nearby (a 13 min walk). The studio of 50m2 is equipped with a living area with a convertible couch/bed and a big double bed. There is a kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, juicer,... There is a private bathroom with shower, toilet and sink. Perfect for a couple + 1 or 2 persons. Close to public transport. You can park in the street or in public parking Vrijdagsmarkt (both paying).

The space
Mooie studio in rustige straat in centrum Gent. De Vrijdagmarkt is in het oudste deel van de stad en is op 700m wandelen. Er zijn een aantal mooie ontbijtgelegenheden in de buurt. Op aanvraag en tegen betaling kan ik voor ontbijt zorgen, een wasje draaien of was drogen. De studio omvat een zitgedeelte met slaapsofa, een kitchenette (frigo, microgolf, koffiezet, sap-pers,..) en een slaapgedeelte met ruim dubbel bed. De badkamer met WC, douche en lavabo is privaat v
neighborhood_overview:
De studio is gelegen in het oudste deel van Gent, op 700m van de vrijdagsmarkt, de oudste markt van de stad. Ook het Patershol met zijn talrijke restaurantjes is binnen diezelfde afstand bereikbaar.
Er is overal aansluiting op de bussen van De Lijn en het treinstation Gent-Dampoort is op 13min wandelen.

The studio is located in the oldest section of Ghent, on 700m from the Vrijdagsmarkt, the oldest market in the city. The Patershol, which houses countless restaurants, is within the same distance.
There are bus stations for public transport everywhere and the station of Gent-Dampoort is just a 13-minute walk.
host_about:
My name is Inge, I live upstairs in the house. For my job I do freelance administration projects for different companies.
I love dancing (Lindy Hop) and sailing.

name: Climate neutral self check-in house with fast WiFi
description:
Book this 3 floor town house. You will have two bedrooms, both have a double bed with super comfortable mattresses on which you want to snooze for hours. The house is perfect to get you relaxed, in the huge couch or huge garden. Public transport takes you to the city center in 10 minutes. Got any questions? Feel free to ask, we want to make your travel experience as smooth as possible.

The space
The place you will book is a town house in a quiet one-way residential street.

The house itself is 120 years old but recently renovated. We take pride in being climate neutral: our energy is produced by our own solar panels, and the natural gas for heating is offset by planting trees.

Also there's super fast WiFi and a high quality Sonos speaker system for you to use as well as a Chromecast enabled TV. Play anything from Spotify, Netflix and Disney+.

Guest access
You have a fully equipped kitchen, living room, two bedrooms and
neighborhood_overview:
Book this house in a super relaxed residential neighbourhood with low crime rates. Kids play on the streets all the time and traffic is limited. You see a very mixed kind of population here. Every demographic is represented. Everyone has a lot of respect for each other.

Very close by there is a vegetable market on Sundays and 3 grocery stores within 5 minutes walking (one just 100m away). Bakery "Dirk" is just 30 seconds away.

name: Brand-new, trendy apartment, sublimely located!
description:
The apartment is located at the heart of Ghent, right next to the gorgeous Portus Ganda. It's brand-new (build in 2017), trendy and full of light. The apartment is easily reachable by public transport and car. There is an underground parking spot available if desired.

The space
The apartment has a spacious bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with shower and a separate toilet. There is also a separate storage room with a washing and drying machine that you can use. The living and dining area are bright and spacious and the kitchen is fully equipped, including a dishwasher. There is a sunny terrace of about 10m2 with a nice view on the courtyard. Bath towels, shampoo and soap are provided, as well as television and WiFi.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the heart of Ghent, right at the gorgeous historic site: Portus Ganda. The historic center is easily reached by foot. Shops, restaurants  and nightlife are readily available. The apartment is part of a nice, luxurious building with no night noise or disturbances of any kind.
host_about: I am Charlotte, a 30-year old, happy girl, living in Ghent and enjoying living and working in Ghent to the fullest. I am living together with my boyfriend in my own apartment in the city-center. I have travelled a lot with Airbnb before and I've only had amazing experiences so far. That's why I decided to start hosting myself. I am most happy to share my lovely apartment (yes I really adore it :)), with others as I think it is the perfect place to stay when in Ghent. Looking forward to hosting you!

name: Cosy room near Begijnhof/Prinsenhof/Gravensteen
description:
Stylish and trendy decorated sunny studio with shower, lavabo and kitchenette. Located only 500 meters from the "Gravensteen" and "Graslei" this is the ideal departure point to discover the historical centre, to shop, to step into one of the numerous brasseries or restaurants, or simply to have a drink on a lovely terrace. Visit a museum, a theatre or a night at the opera ? Everything is possible, and if your legs are tired, remember you can take tram n°1 back to your guesthouse.

The space
Located on the first floor of our completely renovated studenthouse, style mansion. You have your own bathroom and kitchenette. The toilet on the hallway is to be shared with one other student. If you want to bring your own bike, you can stow your bike in the bicycle storage.
neighborhood_overview: On walking distance from the historical centre of Gent.  You won't need your car !

De ruimte is grondig gepoetst en alle oppervlakken en gebruiksvoorwerpen zijn voor elke verhuring grondig schoongemaakt.

The space
The little apartment offers a bathroom with bath, toilet and two washing tables. In the kitchen there's an oven, microwave, four plates to cook and a double sink, many cupboards! name: EXCLUSIVE: Charming Guesthouse in Ghent
description:
This 17th century townhouse is the perfect holiday house for your family, friends or colleagues. It's located in one of the most picturesque neighbourhoods in the heart of Ghent. (5min walk from the city centre!)

Our guesthouse has everything you might need:
- 2 private parking spots available for €10 / booked night / car
- a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
- 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms
- a stunning rooftop view
- a city guide

Read our amazing reviews!

Instagram: @friday.gent

The space
Welcome in our guesthouse, Friday!

Friday is the perfect vacation rental: a fully furnished holiday house for up to 8 people. We’ve renovated this beautiful 17th century town house with a lot of care. You’ll experience all the modern comfort while still feeling its unique & authentic charm. The house is bright, comfortable and ideal for your family, friends or colleagues.

PLEASE NOTE:
neighborhood_overview: Our guesthouse is situated in 'Het Prinsenhof', a medieval gem in the historic city centre of Ghent.  ‘Het Prinsenhof’ or Prince’s Court was a grand castle, birthplace of Emperor Charles V (16th century). The neighbourhood is super charming and above all quiet and calm. We are 5 minutes away from the famous 'Gravensteen' castle and 'De Graslei'. There are plenty of nice coffee bars, restaurants and supermarkets within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi, 

I'm Marie and I grew up in the historical centre of Ghent. 
Now I live with my little family just outside of the city. 

I still love wandering through this hidden gem. 
I'm sure you'll love it too!

You'll find plenty of places to eat and to do in my Guidebook. 

Welcome! 

Marie

name: Gezellige loft in centrum Gent met privé terras!
description:
Onze gezellige loft is erg geschikt voor 1 rustig koppel of gezinnen met 1 of 2 kinderen.
De loft ligt pal in het centrum van Gent, in een autovrije straat naast de Kouter. Onder de Kouter is een grote overdekte publieke parking die 24/24 open is.
De open structuur van de loft geeft een gevoel van ruimte terwijl de badkamer (met deur!) voor de nodige privacy zorgt. Er is ook een uniek dakterras met zicht op de 3 torens van Gent.
De loft ligt op de derde verdieping en er is geen lift aanwezig.

Other things to note
Deze loft is absoluut niet geschikt voor feestvierders:
er zijn meerdere appartementen in het huis en nachtlawaai kan absoluut niet worden getolereerd.
Omdat de loft op de bovenste verdieping ligt is het er aangenaam stil terwijl je toch middenin de stad zit.
Ideaal voor mensen die graag een beetje rust opzoeken en respect hebben voor de nachtrust van anderen.
host_about:
Ik vind het erg belangrijk dat onze huurders zich heel erg welkom voelen in onze loft.
Gent is erg gezellig en ik geef graag tips en uitleg zodat uw verblijf aangenaam en comfortabel verloopt.

name: Exquisite & Authentic Loft in the Historic Center
description:
Hello there and welcome to Ghent! The apartment is located in a calm street in the middle of the historical center of Ghent. In fact, the house itself is a part of it. The building's origins go back to the 14th century and the interior has numerous original 19th century elements such as ceiling, fireplaces and hardwood floors. The iconic must-see churches, cathedral, town hall, belfry, museums and much more are literally around the corner, as are dozens of restaurants and small bars.

The space
The apartment is located on the 1st floor. It has a private bathroom with shower and toilet, a small kitchen, diner table, sitting area and a double bed. There is a small balcony overseeing the street.

Guest access
Guests can use the entrance and hallway which give direct access to the apartment.

Other things to note
I've been trying to keep as much of the authentic architectural elements in place while at the same time provi
neighborhood_overview: The house in located in a somewhat forgotten street, even for locals. That makes it very calm and quiet. 200m on our right you'll bump into the busiest shopping street of Ghent, 500m to our left you're at the town hall and belfry. There's even a shortcut through the 'Werregarenstraat' also known as 'the Grafitti-Street', the only place in the city where it's legal for artist to make spray-paint murals. And there's not a stone  left uncovered. The 'Vlasmarkt' and 'Patershol' areas around the corner are known for their many restaurants and bars. As much as I've tried, there are still many I haven't visited myself
host_about: Hello I'm PJ! I've been living in Ghent for as long as I can remember, I've grown up here and have always loved its ancient buildings, small streets and vibrant social life. Although it's a fairly small city, its cultural and gastronomical opportunities never seizes to amaze me.

name: 'The Boutique' Studio, free CoffeeHouse Breakfast
description:
Charming recently renovated studio with wooden floors and high ceilings. Located on a quiet corner, 5m walk from the centre of town.
FREE BREAKFAST included (coffee, juice, croissant) in the coffee house below.
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!!

Guest access
It's a private studio. No access to other spaces in the building, expect of course, to the coffee house.

Other things to note
Enjoy a perfect start of the day before you start strolling around the city: we offer a free breakfast (coffee, juice, croissant)!

Gasten kunnen een ontbijt (koffie, sapje, croissant) nuttigen in het koffiehuis op het gelijkvloers! Geniet van een perfecte start van de dag voordat je de stad gaat verkennen...
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the appartement!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van het appartement!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

name: Appartement in Gent
description:
A bright, spacious apartment situated in the heart of the historic center of Ghent. All the hotspots are -literally- right around the corner! Discover the 3 iconic towers, the old castle, Mystic Lamb by the Van Eyck brothers and the modern shops and bars.

The space
Three words perfectly describe this property: Location, location, location! The apartment is really cosy and trendy. There is a big window that provides a lot of natural light.
You have an open kitchen with all the equipments that you can use to cook a delicious meal. The apartment has one bedroom with a queenside bed and a sofa bed in the living room.

Guest access
Guests have access to all area's in the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
The car-free city centre is tailor-made for the pedestrian and the cyclist. With bus and tram you can reach any part of the city quickly and easily (even on weekend evenings) and taxis are also readily available.
Ghent is a city with a small-town feel: don’t be afraid to throw away your handy walking map and follow your nose. It’s so much more fun to discover things for yourself. Ghent is a cultural cocktail. There is art everywhere you turn. Wander around the largest low-traffic pedestrian zone in Europe. Walk up and down the streets, experiencing the real Ghent among its nonconformist residents who keep the city alive and kicking.

Only 1 km from trainstation Gent Dampoort, 800m from the Flixbus stop, and 300 m from the busstop (line 3) that brings you to the city centre. We offer you free coffee and tea. Free soap, shampoo, conditioner, towels and bed lin

name: Cute house with a private little garden & 2 bikes
description:
In 2015 we bought this charming house for our student daughters. It is a very atmospheric place. Both, inside and outside. The house is one of the 19 small houses of 'Koer Langerode. Koer Langerode is a very quiet and pedestrian lane in the Ekkergemstraat. We ask our guests to respect this peace.
There are two student bicycles with which the center can be reached very quickly. Nature (Blaarmeersen Park + Beach) is also nearby!

The space
Het huisje klein maar heel gezellig ! Alles is voorzien om er met vier te verblijven. De keuken biedt alle basis comfort. Er is één slaapkamer met een twee persoonsbed en een kamer met bed met uitschuiflade. Indien reservatie voor 4 personen wordt dus een dubbel bed klaar gezet.

Er is een mini tuin (14 M2) achter het huisje. De tuin sluit aan bij de statige tuin van de dekenij van Ekkergem. Je kan er de hele namiddag en avond genieten van de zon en de natuur. ’s Avonds geniet je van een glaasje wijn en/of maalti
neighborhood_overview:
Wil je overdag Gent verkennen ? Afstand is hier geen probleem ! In principe kan je alles te voet doen. Je verblijft op 15 minuten van het historisch centrum van Gent. Na een leuke wandeling van 15 minuten sta je in de winkelstraat van Gent.
Wanneer je even de natuur in wil is dit ook geen probleem. Je bent op 2km afstand van de blaarmeersen. Ook de watersportbaan is op wandelafstand.

Als je boodschappen wil doen heb je de keuze uit alle gekende supermarkten dichtbij. De dichtste supermarkt is op 350 meter ! Er is bovendien een nachtwinkel in de buurt (500 m).

Gent is een fietsstad. Er zijn ook twee studentenfietsen ter
beschikking !
host_about:
Ik ben echtgenoot van Dominique De Vos en  trotse vader van Babette en Margot. 

Ik werk als sociaal werker in Dagcentrum De Trompet ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) ) Dagelijks help ik ouders en kinderen in het creëren van een warme thuis voor hun gezin. 
 
Klussen en ruimtes inrichten is één van mijn passies !  Dit is hetgeen waar ik dan ook in mijn vrije tijd hoofdzakelijk mee bezig ben ! Ik werk ook heel graag in de tuin en lees graag boeken die me helpen in mijn persoonlijke ontwikkeling . 

Zowel op mijn werk als thuis vind ik het belangrijk om een positieve sfeer te creëren waar iedereen zich goed voelt en zichzelf kan zijn. Ook in het verhuren van ons huisje hecht ik samen met mijn vrouw heel veel belang aan sfeer. We verhuren niet zomaar een huisje. We verhuren een beleving !! 

De vele positieve reacties nadat mensen bij ons kwamen logeren geven mij ongelooflijk veel energie !

name: Classy penthouse with terrace in the heart of Gent
description:
A guesthouse in style for people with style.
Our high-end duplexapartment is very accessibly located in between the 'Kouter' (rectangle square where the Flemish Opera is) and the medieval center (St-Bavo-Cathedral, Graslei, Korenmarkt, Gravensteen to name a few highlights).
Brand new, comfortable and classy, with a library-staircase which is not only an eyecatcher. 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Sunny terrace!
We called our gem "LaCasitaBelMundo”, just adding the dot Gent, to get the full picture.

The space
"La Casita", technically not a real house, located in a small residence. As an upper floor duplex, it gives at least the feeling. Passing through a terrace looking out on the University backyard, you enter la casita.
"Bel Mundo", explore and taste it yourself! BELgica, país bellissimo.
Lots of comfort, with a personal tasteful touch, will let you feel at ease. Approved by the Flemish Board of Tourism, we're proud to have got a 4 star-
neighborhood_overview: You can't hardly be located more central, nearto Kouter and Korenmarkt with a lot of hip bars, nice restaurants, fancy shops, quality supermarkets (Delhaize, Cru, Albert Heijn, BioMarket) and on only a few minutes walk from the historical center (Graslei, Gravensteen, St.-Bavo-Cathedral).  You will notice, time is too short.  Explore and taste Ghent, a worthwile visit.
host_about:
We like to travel ourselve, within Europe mostly last years.  But in our earlier life we used to backpack in South- and Central-America, Asia,..   something we hope to do that soon again, though we'll probably prefer a bit more comfort at our age ;-)
Our common interest is broad with an open mind on what is happening in our turbulent world.  We try to give that through to our 9-year-old son.  But let us keep to the love we share for culture, art, music, cinema, theater, ....
Although we like nature a lot, a vibrant city gives us such a wide variety of impressions.  We are new on airbnb, but we booked recently Lisbon and Barcelona.

name: Cozy apartment in the historic center
description:
Quiet apartment in the historic city center of Ghent, in a residential area near the Recolettenlei. The largest shopping street in Ghent and the Graslei with its many terraces are within walking distance. Public transport and car parks are at about 500 meters.

The space
This apartment on the first floor consists of two rooms, separated by a small corridor: a spacious bedroom with a double bed and modern bathroom (shower + toilet), and a sunny living room with a sofa bed where another two people can sleep. For the sake of clarity: the bathroom is separated from the bedroom by a curtain. So, anyone who sleeps in the living room has to go through the bedroom to take a shower or use the toilet.

There is no equipped kitchen but a microwave, fridge and kettle are available in the living room. The rooms still have the authentic wooden floors and beams. Complete privacy is guaranteed: the rooms on the ground floor and in the attic are not occupied. I do spora
neighborhood_overview:
The house is very centrally located in a particularly quiet neighborhood with hardly any traffic. The Veldstraat, the busiest shopping street in Ghent, is a five-minute walk away. The bustling Graslei, cultural center Vooruit, the Medieval towers, museums and countless bars and restaurants are also nearby, as are public transport and various parking garages.

Ghent is also ideally located for visiting the other Flemish art cities, such as Bruges (30 minutes by car), Antwerp (50 minutes) and Brussels (40 minutes). The surrounding countryside, with the artists' village of Deurle and the Flemish Ardennes, is also worthwhile.

name: Stylish Loft in Charming Townhouse in City Center
description:
- Beautiful 18th century townhouse with grand staircase, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Completely renovated in the past year.
- Excellent location in the city center, next to Castle Of The Counts (Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)
- Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.
- Daily disinfection of doorhandles (Covid-19).

The space
You will be staying in a beautiful 18th century townhouse that has been completely renovated in the past year. The high ceilings, large windows and hardwood floors make the place feel very spacious with a lot of natural light. The grand wooden staircase takes you back to the luxury days of Ghentian nobility...

In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).<
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Living The Moment - Your Charming House
description:
Living The Moment is een volledig gerenoveerde woning in hartje Gent. De woning is gelegen in een zeer rustige straat, vlakbij de gerestaureerde rivierboorden. Hier zit je echt tussen de locals en toch vlakbij het bruisende oude stadscentrum. Je bent op enkele passen van alle bezienswaardigheden, bars, restaurants, musea.
Goed bereikbaar met de wagen. Je kan immers je bagage uitladen voor de deur en parking is slechts op 200 meter. Ook vlot bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer.

The space
Je komt binnen in onze gezellig , knusse living, met zithoek, leeshoek , en met een nieuwe , moderne open keuken. De eigentijdse inrichting en de vele lichtinval maken van Living The Moment een rustpunt in het stadscentrum.
Op het eerste verdiep is de badkamer met een grote douche en een zithoek met een zitbank die kan omgevormd worden tot slaapruimte voor 2 personen. Op het tweede verdiep zijn er twee ruime aparte slaapkamers voor telkens 2 personen.

G
neighborhood_overview: Living The Moment is gelegen in een heel rustig, gezellig straatje. Je bevindt je hier in een typische buurt van Gent. Local en relaxed.
host_about:
We reizen de wereld rond, maar houden ongelooflijk veel van onze favoriete stad, Gent. 
We houden van een leuk optreden, een goede film, een origineel theaterstuk en een lekker hapje eten.
In de week , werken we hard, maar in het weekend genieten we van de mooie dinges des levens.

description:
Brand new B&B with beautifully decorated guest rooms with private bathroom and a cosy breakfast area. . This is a gorgeous small luxury B&B with a charming garden, in the middle of the touristic part of Ghent, 5 min. walking from the Gravensteen Castle and the tourist information office. A delicious breakfast can be ordered on the spot, for 17 € pp. In Ghent the citytax is 3 € pp.

The house is full of light and has a relaxing atmosphere. You can recognize it easily from the outside, because of the little prince on the frontdoor and the small white angels above the windows, which are culturally protected. Welcome!

Coming from St. Pieters station you have a direct line 8 minutes (tram 1) to the B&B, the tram stops at our front door (halte Rabotstraat). If you come by car, put 'Nieuwe wandeling' in your GPS, go right direction Burgstraa
neighborhood_overview: This part of historic Ghent is the most quiet, because of the closter atmosphere. You will enjoy walking through the small streets to all the cultural points of interest , the restaurants and the bars which are all at walking distance.

The apartment is recently renovated. Everything is provided for a comfy stay: open kitchen, two bedrooms for 4 persons with each their own bathroom a bath and shower, a sofa bed for 2 in the dining room and a spacious living room with a small balcony overlooking a cozy square.

The space
The building was built by architect Van Impe and has a very particular layout and vibe. A lot of tourist stop to take a picture of this special building. Beware that there several floors so it might not be ideal for people with a disability.

Guest access
The apartment is all yours and is located on the top floors of the building

Other things to note
The apartment is located in a car free street above the Hawaiian Poke Bowl restaurant.

The brand new B&B is located in the historic part of Ghent (500 m from the medieval castle Gravensteen). The place is unique because of the special combination of old elements and original new decoration in a historic house in the center. The cosy garden and breakfast room (with a delicious breakfast at a fair price of 17 €) will make your stay unforgettable. Citytax 3 € ppn

The space
The B&B has 4 private rooms. When booked early, small groups (max 9 pers.) are possible. We are child friendly, couples with 1 or 2 children are possible in this room, please ask for the extra bed . Babies are welcome for free.

Guest access
The welcome room with cosy open fire can be used by the guests and a delicious breakfast is available at 17 € pp.(7.45 until 10.45 AM) in our breakfast room with view on the garden and the closter.

It has a 1.60 m bed with gorgeous linnen covers and cushions. It has no real wardrobe but there is a drawer for clothes under the washbasin and a table for luggage . Nice sitting corner with view and acces to the garden.

neighborhood_overview: The BnB is located near the city center. It is about 8  min walking to the central square Korenmarkt and the medieval Gravensteen fortress. Restaurants and bars are also within walking distance.  Although located close to the center, the BnB is situated in a quite neighborhood and you will enjoy a peaceful sleep. Churches, cathedrals, the Belfry, the Town Hall,  a boat trip on the Leie Canals, musea.... Discover the beautiful city of Ghent by walking through the small streets in a relaxing atmosphere.

Welcome to our luxurious Bed & Breakfast ‘NEST’ in Ghent. We are Colin and Eva, and we were able to realize our dream by taking over this already established B&B.

After enjoying a day out in Ghent, you can come home to one of our large and well-equipped rooms, with a Jacuzzi or a Sauna and a flatscreen TV at your disposal. We offer an optional, yet exquisite self-service breakfast buffet, at only 15 EUR per person.

The space
We have two large and luxurious rooms on offer. On the first floor, you will find a room with Jacuzzi. On the second floor, there is a room with a private Sauna.

Downstairs, there is a kitchen, which can be put to your disposal on demand. We offer an optional, comprehensive self-service breakfast buffet, at only 15 EUR per person.

We invite you to use our cosy common room and terrace, where you can pick up a book or work out on our crosstrainer.

description:
The house is situated in a quiet neighborhood close to Gent Dampoort Station. The historical centre can easily be reached on foot or by bus. The house is supplied with all conveniences.
Wifi is available.

Check in at 3pm
Check out at 12am

W-E-L-C-O-M-E
host_about:
Hi Folks,

I’d like to invite you in my fully restored, bright and open house.  It still needs further work, such as painting... The house is located in walking distance from the city center. The Kunstenaarstraat is a nice and quiet street with a park just around the corner. Shops, places to eat, supermarkets and a few bars are also nearby. 

The accomodation contains a fully fitted kitchen with a gas stove, a fridge and a freezer. We have a dishwasher too! Please feel free to use our espresso machine.

Upstairs you’ll find a bathroom  with a toilet, lavabo and a rainshower. Next to it there is the first bedroom which contains a single mattress and a toddlers bed. Above all this there is a mezzanine with a double bed.

You’ll have access to WiFi.

Bed linen and towels are provided.

name: Stylish fully equipped apartment in Gent

90 square meter, 2-bedroom newly renovated and fully equipped apartment with designer touches. Suitable for two couples, a family of four, or business travelers.

The space
“… beauty through function and simplification.”

Our apartment features an original kitchen designed by Raymond Loewy and was fully renovated with a design theme in his honor. You will see some modern touches combined with an artful '60s design style. There is some original designer furniture and also original artwork.

The apartment features two bedrooms suitable for 4 people, hallway, living room & dining room, fully equipped kitchen, laundry area, a bathroom and independent toilet, a storage area, and high speed wifi.

neighborhood_overview:
Gent-St-Pieters is a beautiful residential neighborhood in Gent situated just outside the city center. Hosting the newly renovated train station, with lots of green and waterways surrounding it, the neighborhood hits the right balance of quiet peacefulness combined with practicality.

The apartment is located at a 5 minute walk from Sint Pieters station. Sint Pieters Station is reachable directly by train from Brussels Airport in about 50 minutes, and from Brussels South in 35 minutes. From Sint Pieters station the train takes you directly to the Brussels City center in 40 minutes and to Brugge in 25 minutes.

Everything is within walking distance from the apartment: the many museums in the vicinity (STAM, SMAK, Museum of Fine Arts), the historic center and its monuments, the St Bavo's Cathedral, the opera, the theater, cinemas, shops, breakfast and coffee houses . We also offer you tips for the best and most charming restaurants in Ghent.

name: Small room downstairs in cosy house in Ghent
description:
Cosy & little house on 20' walk from Ghent Dampoort station & 5-10' by tram from the city centre. Main highways closeby.
The house also hosts a health practice which receives patients during the week. Stays longer than a week-end are only possible when the practice is closed.
You 1rst come into the hallway, you go straight & enter the kitchen and behind the kitchen is your room. The sitting room on the 1rst floor is available during the weekends. There is another room on the second floor.

The space
The room (7m²) has its own bathroom and toilet (3m²). The total surface is about 10-12m².

Guest access
Guests can use the kitchen and the sitting room on the 1rst floor. These are only accessible during the week-ends.

Other things to note
Downstairs is a health practice. Therefore quite and calm during opening hours is a must.

In Ghent there is a recycling policy:
- general trash goes in to the
host_about:
I'm a physical therapist from Ghent, Belgium.

neighborhood_overview: Ghent offers a fascinating cultural cocktail brimming with trendy, modern urban life. Ghent is a city where people enjoy life, a chilled-out place where anything goes and a city that feels human. Its friendly, welcoming people love the good life. Get lost in the historic centre, explore the museums, enjoy our culinary talent and throw yourself into the bustling nightlife.

Feel welcome at our cosy and private apartment at walking distance of the beautiful historic heart of Ghent. You will find everything you need for a comfortable short or longer stay. We do everything we can to offer you a very safe and pleasant stay. We follow the recommended cleaning and disinfecting guidelines strictly and put your health on the first place!

The space
The apartment is very light and sunny and has high ceilings. It is decorated with original art work.

The apartment is a 5 min walk from the Baudelopark and a 10 min walk from Sint James Church and the Friday Market. During the Ghent Festivities (19-28 July) this is the place to be! Great music from all over the world, all night dancing and of course good drinks and food...
Just discover the historic heart of Ghent.... all at walking distance.
If you also want to visit other cities, Dampoort station is only 800 m away!

Thoroughly renovated studio waiting for you to discover Ghent and its surroundings.

Whether you're a couple, a family with small children, good friends or a professional, everything you need is right here in our bright condo with fully equiped kitchen and private bathroom.

Located in a quiet residential area close to Dampoort (train), free parking on the streets, a park with sporting facilities (pool) around the corner.

My 9yo and I will be happy to give you all the insights on Ghent!

The space
This studio is brandnew. We made it out of the attic and upper floor of our house in 2018. It has central heating, a bathroom with walk-in shower and a toilet, a comfortable kitchen with all utencils and mezzanine with a large bedroom.
In the livingroom you'll find a sofabed for 2 people. We also have a little babytent to put next to the bed as a crib.

Guest access
Every corner of the studio is completely at y
neighborhood_overview:
Sint-Amandsberg is a very colourful and layed back neighbourhood. Our house is located at a 2 min walking distance of a large park with an (indoor and outdoor) swimmingpool, playgrounds, sauna, Finish running track etc.

It's a very quiet neighbourhood with lots of hip coffeebars, nice lunchplaces, cool cafés, a nightshop just outside the house, two bakeries nearby, all kinds of grocerystores and supermarkets etc.
host_about: I'm a single mom of a son who was born in 2010 and have been living in Ghent for over 20 years. As long as I can remember, I've had this dream to move to a more southern country. But then life happened. So for now, I love to travel with my boy and explore the world as much as I can. Either by letting people stay at my studio or by going out on an adventure myself.

description:
We welcome you in our beautiful house in a quiet neighbourhood on walking distance from Ghent city centre. The room is equipped with a large double bed and all basic amenities. If they weather is good you can relax on the terrace next to the room. You share the bathroom with another guest room. You can park in front of the house for free. Two brand-new bikes are available for getting into the city easily! We also offer romantic balloon rides above the historical city centre.

There is a tourist tax in Ghent of €2,83 per person per night, which is not included in the price

We love vintage furniture, plants, and old music. That's exactly what you will find in this room with a tropical garden view and direct access. Discover our 60's record player, browse through our three-generation record collection, and lead yourself back into the good old days. The historic city is within a stone's throw.

The space
Enjoy blissful garden wellness with jacuzzi and infrared cabin. This room with garden view is elegantly designed with vintage furniture and lots of beautiful plants. It’s almost like an elegant time machine! To bring even more the feeling of past times; put on one of the antique records that were collected by our mothers and grandmothers many years ago! The shower and the mattress are the only new things in the room! En
neighborhood_overview: It's a quiet suburb area next to the historical center. Perfect for a relaxed stay in Ghent. This neighborhood has a surprising side! For example, in your short way to the city center, there is one of the most impressive and secret historical urban exploring sites! We tell you all about them in our extensive guide, full of tips and off the beaten track sights! Oh, and the best fries shop in Ghent is only 2 min walking from your room! We love our city and want you to see the best parts of it! Thanks to the bikes and phone holders, the whole city is within reach!
host_about: We are back in Belgium to enjoy summer! After a 9 month adventure to start our own AirBNB in Sri Lanka. Hosting is our passion and we wanted to try our chance at the other side of the world!

The space
We have two bedrooms, each with a small terrace. Enjoy late mornings in the king size bed (180x200cm), or snuggle up under the fluffy covers on the sleeping couch in the cosy second bedroom.

Planning on sending out some emails before exploring the city? Use the desk in the second bedroom!

A small elevator will take you to the apartment, please note however that there are a
neighborhood_overview: You will find yourself in the beautiful historic center of Ghent, next to the water and across from the 13th century Dominican Monastery. From the minute you step out of the apartment, you will have your pick of bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and adorable little boutiques.

name: La bellétage by agelandkaai(.be)
description:
Hello, and welcome to La bellétage by Agelandkaai(.be)
Here and online you will find all the info you need to contact us. May be of interest to you to contact us online first.
Search once on the web.
Occupancy taxes and fees is sadly a new tax of 6% imposed by our government, the rest is the Tourist Tax off 3€ a night, for each guest.

The space
Well situated and quiet studio, with terrace, just 200m across Gent-Dampoort railway station, Flixbus and Eurolines, and possible (!) free parking on the station's parking lot.

Gent-Dampoort is the railway station, closest to the city centre, (1km) and has direct trains to Antwerp, Bruges, Kortrijk, Lille Flanders (France), Ypres, and the coastal cities Ostend and De Panne. Weekdays direct train to Brussels at 07h47…

Very easy for city-trips to these cities.
Gay friendly.

Completely renovated & airconditioned belle-étage floor in an old Town House.
Everything you
neighborhood_overview:
Dampuurt, little old Town House on Hagelandkaai, just across the old lock.
Near Kiosko, a summer bar in the little lock house.
City Hall at 900 m, not 25km…
Nightshop just behind us in Dampoortstraat, literally our back neighbours, we call it The Big Fridge.
One block further along the big road is an artisanal Bakery.
Turkish, African, Bulgarian, … shops in Dampoortstraat, and a good SPAR supermarket on Joremaaie, passing in coming home, like 300m from the house.
Dok Brewery is in walking distance, with 30 beers on tap, pizza, burgers, barbecue.
Really nice place with good food and beer. It's on an newly renovated old Factory site, worth a walk around. That area along the other site of the water leaving the city, is now being newly re-developed.
host_about:
Hello, we are Jurgen & Tom
History teacher/certified guide and train manager.
Happy to have you stay with us in our house, we hope it makes you, as many others, feel at home.

When looking for dates to book, might be a good idea to look up agelandkaai online, (our landcode is be), and have a look there, you'll find special offers on restaurants, the parking policy and other extra's, like our walking tours through Gent, and what we offer on food and drinks.

You might notice that we are not available on saturdays for checking in or out. That way we keep our saturdays somewhat to ourselves (cleaning wise). Or to have time for our experience, a historic walking tour through Gent, with Jurgen as your guide.

However if you're staying for four or more days, you can always inquire to arrive or leave on a saturday. Mostly won't be a problem. You have a no, but you might get a yes…

name: Romantic 17th century workers house + free parking
description:
Dit volledig vernieuwd huisje bevindt zich in het centrum van Gent. Op wandelafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden maar toch heel rustig gelegen. Het gehele huis is voor u beschikbaar. Het huisje heeft een stadstuintje, keuken, badkamer, slaapkamer, living, apart toilet en ingang.

The space
A very romantic cosy house in a small street. The street is very quiet although it is in the city center. When you come in the house the toilet is in front of you. If you go left you are in the living room that has a comfortable sleeping/sitting sofa. Also a table with chairs for 5 people make it cosy in front of the heater. To the right you have a stair to the bedroom. If you walk further in the living room you have a kitchen with the bathroom on the left and a window door to the garden.

Guest access
All rooms of the house are yours
neighborhood_overview: Op wandelafstand vind u imposante historische gebouwen en plaatsen, musea, winkelstraten en tal van toffe cafés en restaurantjes. Waar je ook kijkt, in het grotendeels autoluwe centrum van de stad zie je altijd wel een gebouw of een monument met een verhaal. Een versterkte burcht van 1000 jaar oud, drie middeleeuwse torens en de mooiste dubbele huizenrij van Europa liggen op slenterafstand van elkaar.

neighborhood_overview: A quiet, Belle-Epoque residential neighborhood with all kinds of facilities in the area. Two parks around the corner; for a drink & lunch you do not have to walk more than two minutes; a bakery & supermarkets take up 1 to 7 minutes to reach. A multicultural neighborhood with all sorts of eateries within 10 minutes; from hipster bars to kebab. 20 to 25 minutes walk from the historic center which is livelily flooded by students, locals and tourists offer a very extensive choice of dining options. 15 minutes walk from both the Beguinages of Sint Amandberg and Onze Lieve Vrouw ter Hoyen, both UNESCO World Heritage Sites, just like the Belfry Tower (Het Belfort) in the medieval center. You easily need multiple days to explore Gent and its architecture & history.

name: In the heart of the Historic Center!
description:
Welcome to Residence George, where classic urban design meets spacious floor plans. This bright, airy and sunny apartment with atmospheric décor and tasteful design furniture is located in the very center of Ghent. Residence George is a modern 3-bedroom apartment, a few steps from the Christmas Market, at two minutes walking from the Graslei and very close to the famous tourist sights. Restaurants and shops can be found in the immediate vicinity.

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor of a beautiful mansion dating from the mid-19th century. It was designed by a famous Belgian architect who put together the initial plans for an estate with a mirrored ballroom. The building was completely renovated and equipped according to modern standards, including an elevator. Our apartment offers pleasant living spaces for families, professionals, groups of friends, and couples, who want to spend some time in the historic medieval city of Gent. All the rooms have nice oak
neighborhood_overview:

Paul

Paul is a very nice place to enjoy breakfast; located on the “Vrijdagsmarkt” it is very close to our apartment. We can recommend going via “Graffitistraatje”, which is just beside our building.

Fusion Kitchen:

Mosquito Coast

Mosquito Coast is by far the best restaurant in town to enjoy fusion food. MOSQUITO COAST is a restaurant with a 'travel theme' in Ghent, since 1999. “An offbeat cafe with an adventurous character”, as they call themselves. About 2 minutes’ walk from our place.

Alternative Pizza:

Otomat

Otomat has invented pizzas made from the best beer in the world: Belgian Duvel Beer. All the pizzas are also served with exclusive Belgian Beers. Three minutes and you are there!

Italian:

Pane & Vino

name: Spacious house with large garden close to center
description:
Spacious, bright house with large private garden located in a quiet neighbourhood, suitable for up to 4 adults with children. Less than 3km from the historical center of Ghent. Easy to reach by public transport or by bike. Parking in the street is for free.
Ideal for families with children or couples traveling together.
Via the R4 (Ringroad) you can reach the E17 or E40-highway very quick, towards the coast, Kortrijk, Bruges, Antwerp or Brussels.

The space
The house was recently renovated and has all the comfort, with large bright rooms.

Downstairs is the entrance hall, toilet, open kitchen with dining and seating area, everything with underfloor heating. In addition, a spacious desk and play area.

The open kitchen overlooks the spacious terrace and the large garden (100 meters deep!). Play house, trampoline and playroom in abundance! For the adults it is wonderful to stay on the terrace, have a barbecue or enjoy a drink at a crack
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighbourhood is a quiet neighbourhood, ideal for escaping the hectic city life. Within walking distance there is a Delhaize supermarket (200m) and a fresh bakery (800m). In the neighbourhood there are some nice restaurants where it is delicious dining. Would you rather eat something at home? Deliveroo or other delivery services are available.

Nearby you have the Rozebroeken Park with the Lago Sports and Recreation Center, a real swimming paradise.

name: 'The Jungle' Studio, free Coffeehouse Breakfast
description:
Charming recently renovated studio with wooden floors and high ceilings. Located on a quiet corner, 5m walk from the centre of town.
FREE BREAKFAST included (coffee, juice, croissant) in the coffee house below.
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!!

The space
It's a private studio. No access to other spaces in the building, except of course, to the coffee house.
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the studio!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van de studio!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

name: A Flemish Tale - Our Bird's Nest
description:
This room is our birds' nest, a perfect mix of modernity and minimalism, coziness under the roof and elegance in marbled showers. The best experience is the most breathtaking views of Ghent's churches and historical buildings. The room features a queen-sized bed with 4 pillows (feather and microfiber) and very soft linen, a great shower with liquid soap, shampoo and conditioner, separate toilet, a coffee / tea maker and free WiFi.

The space

name: Grote gezinswoning in Gent. Spacious familyhouse.
description:
Ons huis bevindt zich vlak aan het centrum. Heel gemakkelijk te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer. Tram 1 rijdt van het Sint-Pietersstation en naar het centrum.
Het is ons eigen huis, waar we met ons 6 in wonen, en dat we graag open stellen voor andere gezinnen die Gent willen leren kennen.
Je kan gebruik maken van alles wat hier in huis is, natuurlijk met respect voor alles.

The space
We wonen zelf in dit huis. Dus alles wat ongeveer nodig is, is aanwezig. Je kan hier koken, wassen en ontspannen.

Guest access
Tot alle.
neighborhood_overview:
Het huis bevindt zich niet in het oude centrum van Gent. Het is hier rustig, maar alles is wel dicht bij en gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Kom je voor de Gentse feesten? Dan geraak je er heel gemakkelijk, maar kan je weer in alle rust gaan slapen.
We wonen in een multiculturele buurt, wat er ook voor zorgt dat er dicht bij heel wat "gewone" supermarkten zijn maar ook Turkse, Syrische, Marokkaanse winkels, bakkers en restaurants aan goedkope prijzen.
Ga je de andere kant uit, dan kom je snel in de Bourgoyen, een mooi natuurgebied dat elk seizoen prachtig is.
host_about: We are a family of 6, 2 parents and 4 teenagers. We welcome people here when we're not (all of us) at home, because it's a pity to leave our home empty as others would like to visit Ghent. We like to travel a lot. We love our home and Ghent so we are always glad to return home. So other travellers are welcome here. It's more cosy and cheaper than a hotel. So we'd like to let our house used by other family's. Welcome!

name: Authentic city house with a lovely patio
description:
Totally renovated romantic ground floor apartment with a lovely patio in Ghent with 3 double bedrooms foreseen of all luxury to have a perfect stay. The house has a typical facade, high ceilings and is completely decorated. The historical center is only a 10 min walk. Public transport is just in front of the property.

The space
Dit huis dateert van de 18 e eeuw en is net volledig gerenoveerd. Alle details zoals de hoge plafonds, moluren en rozetten zijn perfect gerestaureerd waardoor de authentieke aspecten volledig bewaard gebleven zijn. De keuken en de leefruimte is hedendaags ingericht met alles erop en eraan. De master bedroom beneden is prachtig !Iedere ruimte is sfeervol aangekleed met artistieke fotografie. Buiten in de patio komt u zeker volledig tot rust. Dit alles op wandelafstand (10 min) van het historische centrum. Parkeren is mogelijk in de straten rondom de woning. Dit is een unieke woning in het centrum van Gent!!

Other things to no

name: Stylish Studio 'Suite César' in the heart of Ghent
description:
If you are looking for a short time stay in Ghent, 'SUITE CESAR' is the ideal place for you!

Situated in the Tinnenpotstraat, 400m from the Gravensteen Castle, our bright studio will be your cosy cocoon in the heart of the city.

We provide you a fully furnished, modern and affordable studio with room up to 2 people.
Our kitchen includes a microwave, Nespresso machine, water boiler, induction cooking plate and big fridge.

Free WIFI!

The space
We provide you a fully furnished, modern and affordable studio with room up to 2 people in the historical centre of the city, near The Castle of the Counts (Gravensteen).

Other things to note
The city tax of 2,83 euro per person per night is not included in the price.
neighborhood_overview:
Suite César is located in a prime location in the historical center of Ghent.
Situated in the Tinnenpotstraat, a charming and quiet neighborhood, a few minutes walk from the bustling center.

The Tinnenpotstraat owes its name to the hostel 'In den Tinnen Pot' (house number 44-46).
It already existed in the 14th/15th century and still can be recognized by the sign above the door.
This street is also famous for the Tinnenpot Theater on number 21.

Nearby is the Prinsenhof, created by buildings around the former Hof ten Walle, the residence of the Viscount of Ghent.
This Hof ten Walle was the birthplace of Emperor Charles V and was named from then on 'Prinsenhof'.

400m away the Gravensteen Castle is located, the only surviving medieval castle in Flanders and a very important tourist attraction for the city.
host_about:
MOM - MARRIED - BORN IN THE 80'S

LOVE: Nature - Traveling - Family - Interior Design - Fashion - Netflix

Enjoy The Little Things In Life!

Check-in Saturday - Sunday: 14:00h check-out: 11:00h
Day of check-in you can use the option to dropp luggage, parking space and bikes before 18:00h. Option available from 12:00h!

We are both working as teachers fulltime during the week. We prepare and clean the rooms after the working hours. That's why our check-in starts in the evening.

The space
The studio is located on the first floor of our house. (Private!)
It has an open kitchen, sitting area, double bed, freestanding bathtub in the room, private bathroom with toilet and shower.

The kitchen has everything you need to provide your own meals. (herbs, oven, fridge, freezer, ..) and a coffee machine.

Also a music insta

If you want to have a proper dinner i advice to go to the city center.
host_about:

Welkom ❤️

The house has 3 bedrooms and one playroom for kids. The first room has one double bed and the second room has 2 beds (only) for children (bunk bed). In the last bedroom, 4 people can sleep. (also a bunk bed).

We don't recommend the house for 8 adults.
