host_about:
I'm an artist working and living in Ghent, Flanders in Belgium. I love to go to city's where's a lot of great art and a vibe in the city. I have a great husband, who is an interior designer, and two young children; Poppy and Lucky. We love doing city trips with our friends or just the two of us. We love to stay in large and cosy locations, because we need the space to relax. Beside City trips we like visiting nature and locations with wellness facilities. We embrase every day as a gift and live life to the fullest.  
The boathouse i'm advertising on airbnb we renovated ourselves. We made the studio with our passion for furniture. We want that guests feel themselves comfortable and enjoy it and feel the positive energy we've put in this project.

Mooie, lichte & rustige studio met 2 slaapkamers en privé badkamer in het hartje van het Historisch Centrum van Gent, op enkele minuten wandelen van highlights zoals het Gravensteen, Graslei & Korenlei en het Belfort van Gent.

Deze prachtige accommodatie is werkelijk een heerlijke locatie om te verblijven. Perfect om de cultuur, geschiedenis, energie en eten van deze geweldige stad te verkennen en ervan te genieten.

Welkom in ons 'Oak House', je voelt je meteen thuis in het fantastische Gent!

The space
Deze comfortabele studio bevindt zich op de tweede verdieping (niveau +2) van een prachtig gebouw.
Het gebouw is zeer centraal gelegen: bus/tram stopt op 100m diverse openbare parkeergarages op slechts enkele minuten afstand, supermarkt & kruidenierswinkel op nog geen 200 meter & tal van culturele, historische & culinaire hoogtepunten op wandelafstand.

Het is een schone, moderne studio die je van alle comfort voorziet: eigen ba
neighborhood_overview: Mooie buurt, zeer centraal maar ook rustig. Alles is op loopafstand: prachtige historische gebouwen, de culturele hoogtepunten, geweldige restaurants, gezellige bars & buurtwinkels - het beste dat Gent te bieden heeft.
host_about: Hi, I have lived in the city of Bruges and Ghent my entire life. I'm passionate about interior design, real estate, hospitality and travel. I'm an experienced Airbnb host. If you have any questions, please send me a message via Airbnb. Many thanks! Kind regards

name: Sleeping on a boat - Ecohostel
description:
Ship ahoy!
Looking for a hostel that shows the spirit of Ghent? Somehow different, friendly, fun, but most of all relaxed?

It's not everyday you can be a pirate, you might as well go for it! Don't forget that land was only created to provide a place for boats to moor... You'll find the boat on a lazy canal just outside the historic centre, quiet, lush and green.

So hopefully you'll love Ghent as much as we do!!

The space
We offer 4 rooms, two with a double bed, one room with 3 bunk beds and one room with 4 bunk beds.
Bed linnen is included in the price, as well as pillows and duvets.

The hostel can at the moment only be booked completely. The number of people staying is up to you but maximum 12. A group with more than 12 can contact us for possible reservations with more guests.

name: Camping with your own tent in a private wood
description:
Bring your tents and camp with your own camping gear in a private wood in the green area around Ghent. The small wood is located on the property of 4000m2, next to the garden.You will be able to use a pic-nic table (max 8 people), a barbecue and a hammock. You can take a walk in the small forest or enjoy a nice, relaxing evening in the nature. Maximum of 8 people are allowed. The bathroom is situated in the property on the first floor. Stay in your own bubble and enjoy nature!

The space
The camping area is located in the private forest, next to the garden. There is a place where you can set-up your own tents. A maximum of 8 persons are allowed. During your stay, you can use the pic-nic table and barbecue for food preparation. The toilet and shower are located on the first floor of the house (30m walk).
There is a hammock where you can relax.

Guest access
You will have access to the small forest, the pic-nic table and hammock.

The loft is located in a quiet neighbourhood about 4 kilometers away from the city centre of Ghent. We have FREE & SECURED parking for your car. ♡ There is a tramline just around the corner that goes straight to the city centre. (+- 20 minutes) We have city bikes that can be used.

The space
The loft is located on the second floor of our house.(attic)
It has a small kitchenette with an electric stove, microwave/oven, refrigerator + freezer, kitchen set and sink. Everything you need to provide your own meals is there.
There is a sitting area, as well as a double bed. There is a bathroom provided in the same space with a freestanding bath and sink. We have fresh towels, shampoo and showergel. There is also a private toilet in the same room behind a door. (enclosed) There is a tv with cable and hdmi for laptop.
Both the kitchen and the bathroom are build only a few months ago, so everything is in perfect condition. The whole studio is open with a lo

It’s a nice quiet street. The public transport is just around the corner. If you walk 5 minutes you have a square that’s called Vanbeverenplein. There you have some shops: supermarket, pharmacy, snackbars, night shops, butchery, bakery,...

If you want to have a proper dinner i advice to go to the city center.
host_about:
Hoi! 

Wij zijn Veronique en Maël, moeder en dochter, twee beste vriendinnen. 
Wij runnen samen de Green Attic en de Cosy studio in Gent, België. 
Wij werken beiden fulltime als kleuterleidster in het onderwijs en runnen de airbnb's na onze werkuren. 

We houden er van om iedereen een thuis gevoel te bezorgen, hier bij ons in Gent. 
Welkom ❤️

name: Unique experience - spacious boathouse near center
description:
Cosy yet spacious and warmly decorated design appartment at my house boat, the Aurelia Feria.

- a 15min walk to the city center and at 2min walk from the train station.

- ATTENTION: be aware,the airbnb is adjacent to my private living area. You have the airbnb space to yourself but the wall between the 2 parts is not accoustically isolated so for sound you are not completely private. FROM 27/03/2023 THE ROOM WILL BE ACCOUSTICALLY ISOLATED FROM MY LIVING ROOM BY A NEW WALL.

The space
you have a whole space of 60m2 to yourself, next to my private part of the boat.

Furthermore there is a spacious deck to enjoy the sun and views as well as a glass roof above the living area that opens to have a cool breeze or lots of natural light streaming in. It is exceptional for a houseboat to draw so much light in. In winter there is a cosy stove to keep your feet warm.

you can expect:
- a bath in front of a window looking out
neighborhood_overview:
The boat is located at the entrance of the 'new docks' (Nieuwe Dokken), an area just next to the center where in the past this was an industrial area, operating over water.
This whole area (that used to be 'the old docks') has recently been developed (and still is) with areas to live, schools, open space, playground, beach, bars, cycling path, walking path, etc. New neighboorhood that due to Corona is now also being discovered by the Ghentians, for walking and cycling, and for water activities. It is still a quiet place so close to the city, train station and the ring of Ghent. But fun on the water (lots of kayaking, little boats, rubber boats, paddle boarding) is popular nowadays and it comes close, since you are also on the water ,-) and people are curious to see life on a boat.

The boat is next to a quay and a cycling path. There is no car road, only a simple road where residents can load and unload the car, as can you if you come with the car.

Unfortun
host_about:
Hi, I am Lies and i live on the houseboat with my 2 children, Viggo and Raffi. They alternate between me and their dad every other week.  

 I bought the Aurelia Feria end of 2017. It is a 'spits', used to be a cargo boat of 40 m long and was build end of the 60's. 

Since January 2020 the boat is back at its permanent own spot on the water after a thorough renovation. 

And my children as well as me are enjoying our new home to the fullest, even though it is not completely finished and I can not see, feel or smell paint anymore. 

The boat is also used for my coaching practice, to guide groups and individuals on their 'quest' to connection, with themselves, with others and with the world around them. 

 Finally, I also wish to offer it to people all around the world to come and experience life on a boat and discover the fantastic city of Ghent, where I have been living for the last 20 years. 

Let me know what the space brings you or still needs to serve its purpose. 

For people who are interested in exploring themselves, a coaching session can also be arranged :-)

name: Ruime bovenverdieping vlakbij centrum van Gent.
description:
Vanuit onze gezinswoning in Ledeberg is het centrum van Gent vlot bereikbaar, zowel met de fiets als het openbaar vervoer. Straatparkeren aan laag tarief. De ganse bovenverdieping van onze bel-etagewoning is ter beschikking en bestaat uit een slaapkamer, badkamer, zitruimte en koffiehoek. Er is zeer veel licht en het geeft een ruim gevoel.

The space
In de slaapkamer is een persoonlijke kast beschikbaar, alsook een klerenhanger en wat opbergruimte.
In de zitruimte kan je genieten van een plaat (platendraaier aanwezig).
In de koffiehoek wordt thee en koffie aangeboden, tegen vrije bijdrage.

Other things to note
We hebben een kat Oreo. (voor wie allergisch is) In de verblijfsruimte is roken niet toegestaan. Rokers kunnen in de stadstuin roken.
neighborhood_overview: Gent is een prachtige historische stad met een dynamisch karakter. Het centrum begint op 4 km van de Air BnB. Als je de tram neemt aan de kerk van Ledeberg (op 800m) ben je er zo.

For a comfortable stay it can host up to 3 adults or 2 adults + 2 younger children.

neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Deze bijzonder mooie hoek van Gent is een stad-in-de-stad. Vergeet even waar je bent en laat je onderdompelen in de middeleeuwen. Snuif de nostalgie van oude leefgewoonten op. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.

name: ★Lovely gorgeous duplex  w A/C near centre★
description:
This two story accomodation is perfect for up to 8 people visiting the lovely city of Ghent. It's located in the historic Saint-Macharias neighborhood, where Ghent originated! Nowadays it's a quiet area along the river, with many parks ánd at walking distance of the new city centre.
The place you will be staying at has 2 double beds, a bunk bed and a sofa bed, for up to 8 people. Furthermore two bathrooms, 2 equipped kitchens, airco, WiFi,... everything you need for a nice holiday!

The space
Modern, beautiful and practical, that's what we were aiming for:
- 3 bedrooms with 2 double beds (4p), a bunk bed (2p) and a sofa bed (2p)
- enough closet space to put away your clothes and other luggage
- 2 bathrooms with rain shower, a double and single sink, 2 toilets
- equipped kitchens with a fridge on both floors
- water boiler and coffee machine for hot beverages
- washing machine, drying rack, iron and ironing board at disposal
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the historical city center of Ghent. Now a lovely quiet family area, near the water for a stroll besides the house boats and through the parks. Local shops and restaurants are closeby and the city centre at 10m walking, where you find many more bars and shops, and of course the great attractions of Ghent!

We look forward to hosting you and providing you the best Airbnb experience.

name: Oude jeneverbrouwerij van 1740
description:
Het huis dateert van 1740 en was origineel een jeneverbrouwerij. In 2017 werd het volledig gerenoveerd met behoud van zoveel mogelijk authentieke elementen in combinatie met een eigentijdse inrichting. De houten balken en vloeren brengen je terug naar vroeger, de stalen trappen, moderne afwerking en het losstaand bad doen je genieten en ontspannen in stijl. Er is plaats voor maximum 6 personen. Je hebt 3 slaapkamers (met telkens een tweepersoonsbed) en 2 badkamers als je Peper boekt.

The space
Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Op het gelijkvloers vind je ons restaurant waar je kan lunchen en dineren. We hebben een authentieke wijnkelder en werken met een coole wijnmachine waar je kan proeven van 16 verschillende wijnen. Vanaf het eerste verdiep kom je in onze gerestaureerde B&B waar je met maximum 6 personen kan verblijven. Eerste verdieping: een gezellige living met een volledig uitgeruste kitchenette, bar en sofa. De originele houten vloeren en balken bleven behou
neighborhood_overview: Peper ligt op 5 minuten van het Gravensteen en op 8 minuten van de Korenmarkt in een rustige buurt. Naast ons vind je het oude Elisabeth Begijnhof wat zeker een bezoekje waard is.
host_about: Welkom bij Peper. Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Samen met mijn man Philip hebben we een restaurant, wijnbar en B&B in Gent.

name: Houseboat Orfeo
description:
The houseboat Orfeo is a fully equipped 120 m2 boat. The boat was originally build in 1909 but has been completely renovated. It is located at 10 minutes walk from the city center and close to public transports and shops. From the terrace you can enjoy the idillic view on the water.
One of the two rooms can be rented with a private bathroom. Optionally two extra guests can sleep on a bed in the living room.
The kitchen is shared, but you can always contact me and ask if there are other guests.
host_about: Hi, I am a bio-engineer and musician. I was born and raised in Ghent so i know the town quite wel. I travelled a lot so I know what you expect of a good host. I hope to welcome you to my place so that you can have a great stay in Ghent.

name: Upscale residence with private pool
description:
The main floor has an open floorplan with floor-to-ceiling windows offering abundant natural light. The living and dining room are directly facing the large, saltwater pool making the perfect expression of indoor-outdoor living. The gourmet kitchen has a high-end gas range, microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher. The two bathrooms one with walk in shower and one with egg shaped bathtub are designed for optimal comfort and luxury.

The space
Brand new construction with timeless design. High end finishes with large wooden beams, steel windows and upscale furniture.

Guest access
48 hours before arrival detailed access instructions will be send, and a key will be provided through a lock box

Other things to note
New Washer and dryer are available in the residence upon request.
neighborhood_overview: Privacy is highly regarded. The residence is located on a dead end street, surrounded by farmland. Nevertheless, excellent restaurants are within a 4 to 8 km radius. The historic towns of Ghent and Bruges are located 12 km and 39 km from the house.
host_about:
Ik hou van rust, tuinieren, gezellig genieten van de kleine dingen. 
De inrichting  en verfraaiing van onze locaties vinden we ook bijzonder leuk. We houden van privacy en respecteren dan ook deze van onze gasten. We doen er alles aan om jullie een TOP verblijf te bezorgen.

name: Quiet, luxury apartment near Gravensteen Castle
description:
Dit ruime appartement van 93m2 bevindt zich in hartje Gent, vlakbij het Gravensteen. De ruime living met eetplaats en volledig ingerichte keuken kijkt uit op een rustige binnenkoer. Het appartement omvat 2 mooie slaapkamers en een praktische badkamer met inloopdouche en wastafel.
Er is een handige berging met strijkfaciliteiten.

name: Verdiep m zicht op torens van Gent 10min v centrum
description:
Welcome to my house close to the center of Ghent.
The space is the attic space that is rented out completely privately. From the living room you have a view of the towers of Ghent!
BEDROOM
Double bed, can be completely darkened.
LIVING SPACE
Espresso machine, kettle, fridge, crockery provided.
BATHROOM
Shared with me. Toilet, bath and walk-in shower provided.
HALL
Private hall with storage space.
LOCATION
10min and you are in the center by bus or bicycle, or a 25min walk.
ATTENTION
Stairs!

The space
The entire space is divided as follows:
Private stairs to the upper floor flowing into a private hall with storage space for clothes and space to place suitcases, shoes, jackets and the like.

Guest access
The top floor of the house is private for the tenants. Here you will find a bedroom, living room with dining area and amenities and private hall with storage space. The floor
neighborhood_overview:
This cultural neighborhood offers conviviality and tranquility within walking distance of the city center. You are in the center of the city in 10 minutes by bus or bicycle or a 25-minute walk. The Dampoort train station is also a few minutes away from the house. The neighborhood is bustling with cozy businesses where you can have breakfast or dinner or have a drink. You will also find all kinds of shops nearby so everything you need is within walking distance. At the same time, you will also find peace and quiet around the Scheldt.
From here you can go to the living city or quiet nature a few minutes away.

name: Designer Ghent Apt - Prime Location for 4 Guests
description:
Welcome to our beautiful and spacious apt located in the prime area of Ghent. Furnished with attention to detail, our apartment provides all the modern comforts to make you feel at home. With a hassle-free self check-in process, you can easily settle in and start enjoying your stay. Families and couples are welcome, but we do not allow young groups. Bed- and bath linen are NOT provided, please bring your own. We look forward to hosting you in our lovely Ghent apt, where you can relax in style.

The space
This is a perfect accommodation for 4 in a great location in the centre of Gent, easily walkable to the centre of the town, restaurants, cafes, a park and local shops.

The kitchen is very well equipped and the apartment has everything you might need. There's a bathroom with shower, sink, toilet and hairdryer.

There is a double bed and a sofabed present.


! *Important!* : we do NOT offer bedlinnen and bath towels, so you must

name: Peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent
description:
Zeer landelijk en rustig geleden peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent. Gelegen op 4 km van centrum Drongen (aan de Leie) en op 10km van Gent. De studio staat los van de landelijke woning en is voorzien van alle nodige comfort en ruimte. U kan gebruik maken van een ruim afgesloten privé parking en carport, twee fietsen en een bbq staan ter beschikking. Onder het overdekte terrasje kan u volop genieten van rust en zon. Een warm en hartelijk ontvangst maken dit onvergetelijk.

The space
De met oude bouwmaterialen gebouwde eiken studio 'De Liberteyt' biedt je naast sfeer en warmte een oase aan rust. De studio is onder meer uitgerust met gezellige sfeerverlichting, Tv, wifi, frigo en eigen muziek via het sonos systeem. Onder het overdekte privé buitenterrasje kan u volop genieten van zon en rust.
neighborhood_overview: U bevindt zich op fietsafstand van dag behoeften en op 4km van het centrum van Drongen waar u alle nodige comfort makkelijk kan terugvinden. Wandel, fiets en zelfs boottochten zijn allen vlakbij. Per fiets of met de bus ben je op amper 10km van het stadscentrum verwijderd. Dit wordt zonder meer genieten.

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot in Ghent
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. We created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two BBNT's (Bedroom, Bathroom and private terrace). We have a unique location that is easily reachable by train, bike, bus or even by car!

If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment) and receive our personal recommendations, then this is your 'go to' place.

Love to host you and communicate in NL/FR/ENG,
Urban Greetings,
Anissa

The space
This space is unique because of its own character. The building is entirely renovated in 2020 and offers you a beautiful place to stay within the city center of Ghent without any disturbing noise.

However this space doesn't have a kitchen.

Guest access
You have access to a double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace. If you come by bike you can park your bike, SUP, motorcycle, ...at our plo
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity of city members of this city AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

name: Room in historical B&B at railway station in Ghent
description:
Our B&B and restaurant Koeketiene is situated near the train station Gent-Sint-Pieters (5 min walking distance) and the Citadelpark.

An ideal starting point from which to explore Ghent (centre at 20 min walking distance).

You stay in a historic mansion from 1906.

Each room is unique and has all the comfort you need.

Downstairs you can enjoy a delicious breakfast or lunch with local products in our restaurant.

The space
Jack

Size of the room: 24m²

Kingsize bed: 180 x 200cm

The room, Jack, is natural, light and cosy and is decorated with lots of plants, rootan and bamboo.

It makes it very relaxed and comfortable. It's a lovely place to relax after a busy today.

Jack is on the second floor, at the backside of the house.
Our private living room is on the same floor.

Jack has a kingsize bed and a private bathroom with bath and shower.

Gu
neighborhood_overview:
The B&B is very close to the railway station (5 mins walking distance) and to the Citadel Park.

It's close to the city center, 20 mins walking distance.

There are several little restaurants and shops in the area.

Room for 6 people.
2 bedrooms and one sleeping couch for 2 people in the living room.

Private bedrooms, living area, kitchen and bathroom.

name: Mooie studio met badkamer en keuken vlakbij Gent
description:
2 mooie kamers + badkamer en keuken op de 3e verdieping van ons huis. De traphal leidt je naar boven zonder door onze leefruimte te passeren. Beide kamers hebben veel daglicht. Een slaapkamer met een tweepersoonsbed en veel kastruimte, een kamer met een mooi bureau en een zithoek. Er is een nieuwe douchekamer met apart toilet en mogelijkheid om iets te koken. Fietsen beschikbaar. Dichtbij park (50 meter) en supermarkt (2 minuten wandelen). Met de fiets 10 minuten van het historisch centrum.

The space
1 slaapkamer met een tweepersoonsbed van 1m80 breed en ingemaakte kasten + 2 nachttafeltjes. 1 leefkamer met een tweepersoonszetel, een keukenmeubel en een tafel voor 2 personen. 1 badkamer met inloopdouche en toilet. Op de overloop is er ook plaats om extra gerief te zetten. De volledige verdieping is privé voor de gasten.

name: GLORIA LOFT GENT
description:
De loft bestaat uit één grote ruimte van 140m2. Met twee slaapkamers met dubbel bed . Waarvan één met groot ligbad , twee lavabo's en een douche. Gratis toiletartikelen zijn voorzien alsook handdoeken. Een ingerichte keuken met oven, microgolf, vaatwasmachine, nespresso machine (met cups),...
Het appartement bevindt zich op 500 m van de voetgangerszone (binnenstad Gent is verkeersvrij). Net nog bereikbaar met de wagen. Parkeren kan dichtbij op Parking Ramen.

name: Private room, close to the city center of Ghent
description:
Wees welkom in ons gerenoveerd huis waar je op de 2de verdieping over een privé kamer beschikt. Hieraan gekoppeld is er een privé badkamer op de 1ste verdieping.

Ideale ligging om te bereiken met de auto. Gratis parkeren voor de woning.

De woning is gelegen in een rustige wijk, dus gegarandeerd rustige nachten.

Er zijn fietsen beschikbaar om tot in het centrum te fietsen (15min). De tramlijn 1 (Flanders expo) ligt op 5 minuten rijden van de woning. Deze rijdt om de 10min naar het centrum.

The space
De volledige bovenverdieping is voor jou. Er is een aparte privé badkamer voorzien. Bad en douche tot de mogelijkheden.

Eigen inkom, tuin aanwezig, mogelijkheid tot gebruik van de keuken en de woonruimte.

Er is een tweepersoonsbed voorzien. Optioneel kan er een luchtbed bij geplaatst worden.

Guest access
Maak gebruik van je eigen badkamer en eigen slaapverdieping.

name: The Pink Room
description:
The Pink Room is located on the first floor. This is a very typical Flemish house so the stairs are very steep and narrow.
If you have had a few too many Belgian beers you could get to the ground floor very quickly!!!
This is a private home that I share with people from every corner of the globe.
I provide a safe environment for everyone.
I ask that every guest respects that this is a shared space and home.
After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

Guest access
Check-in is from 16:00. Check-out is by 11:00. There is a €5 charge per hour for either early check-in or late check-out. This fee is non-negotiable.

Extra person staying over must be asked for in advance with prior approval (before 18:00). The price is €35 a night per extra person, to be paid for in advance.

If you have a guest over for the night without prior approval, a €75 fine will be charged.

name: Ruime woning aan Gentse stadsrand - Lange verhuur
description:
We verhuren graag ons huis terwijl we er zelf op uit trekken. Onze charmante en lichtrijke woning met herenhuis allures biedt je veel ruimte, op 10-15 min fietsen van centrum Gent en 5 min fietsen van de Gentbrugse Meersen, een leuk natuurgebied.

Due to a temporary stay abroad we like to rent out our home to people like us, looking for a new environment. Our charming & bright home offers you ample space, 10-15 min cycling to the city center of Ghent & 5 min to a natural area

The space
- Gelijkvloers: lichtrijke leefkeuken met kookeiland, tafel en toegang tot koer, woonruimte met zetel en tafeltje dat eventueel als bureau kan dienen, TV (enkel Netflix en Streamz), gang met toilet, toegang tot kelder
- Eerste verdiep: grote slaapkamer met dressing, nineties badkamer met bad en vernieuwde douche en wasmachine
- Zolderverdiep: deze ruimte moeten we nog verder opfrissen, maar proper genoeg om spullen te leggen of je was te drogen.
neighborhood_overview:
- Op 300m: de Schelde (verkeersvrij wandelen en fietsen), bakker, leuk restaurantje voor afhaal, frituur, parkje
- Op 800m-1km: buurtwinkels, supermarkten
- Op 1,5km: E17 op/afrit Gentbrugge, Gentbrugse Meersen natuurgebied
- Op 2,5-3km: stadscentrum Gent
host_about:
We are Céline and Benjamin, always looking for the next travel adventure! 
Update 2021: For the first time we want to try out renting out our  own home while we are out exploring new places. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions!

name: Gent Logeerplek dichtbij gezellige stadscentrum
description: Wij wonen in één van de leukste huizen in één van de leukste buurten van Gent. Gasten hebben de hele bovenste verdieping ter beschikking. Na 3 minuutjes wandelen ben je in het gezellige stadscentrum. Je proeft, voelt en ziet de sfeer van Gent van zodra je de deur uit bent. In onze wijk zijn er veel lekkere restaurants en gezellige koffiebars. Je kan ook een hele fijne graffitiwandeling doen (een plannetje geven we je mee) of lekker gaan uitwaaien in de Oude Dokken.
neighborhood_overview: Ons huis ligt op 5 minuten stappen van Oudburg en het Patershol, gezellige kasseistraten met veel lekkere restaurantjes. Op 7 minuten stappen ben je aan het Gravensteen, de middeleeuwse burcht pal in het centrum.

name: Charming guest house in the back of a garden.
description:
Our charming house near the city center is situated in the back of our garden. It is accessable through a separate entrance. The ground floor consists of a spacious bedroom with a terrace. The first floor has a trendy living room, sofa bed, open kitchen and bathroom with a shower. You will find all modern comfort. The authentic master bedroom on the top floor includes a comfortable and quiet working space . A perfect spot for tourists and professionals!

The space
This renovated coach house offers all comfort such as wifi, TV and a separate entrance with access code. There is a modern kitchen, bathroom and two separate toilets. Perfect for two couples or a family with children, but also for professionals looking for a long stay. The spacious bedrooms are also suitable as a work/study place. Privacy is guaranteed at all times. You can sit in the sun on the terrace or even play a game of table tennis.

Other things to note
Parking in the stree
neighborhood_overview:
Our 19th century house is located on a quiet street in a lively neighborhood. The train station is nearby, and the old town is at a 15-minute walk. There are plenty of trendy places for wining and dining.
De Nieuwe Dokken, one of the newest and most innovative districts of Ghent, is a little further away. Those who like to walk or run can easily visit the Gentbruggemeersen, a beautiful nature reserve. On foot, by bike or public transport: there is always something to enjoy in Gent.

name: Verne Dreams : Oxford Loft
description:
Verne Dreaming is een fantastische keuze voor reizigers in Gent. Het biedt een romantische omgeving en veel nuttige voorzieningen voor tijdens je verblijf. Dompel je onder in Oxford, de Engelse kamer in Napoleon groen.

host_about:

name: Completely furnished and equipped house
description:
Want to experience Ghent as a local? Here you get a whole, completely furbished and equipped house, so you can enjoy the city. We lived here for 7 years and left the house as it is, including toys for kids etc. You can use everything. The house is in a neighborhood just outside the centre, tram stop 1 is a very short walk away and there is also a bus stop nearby. We have AC on the top floor in the big bedroom and mobile AC in the bedroom on the 2nd floor. Beware: steep stairs to go to 3rd floor!

The space
The house is completey furnished, equipped. You can immediately start living there. We used to host one room only, when we were still living there ourselves. To see feedback about that, look under "Swonnie's double room". We had lots of guests with lots of positive reviews. This time, it will be different, as we will not be there ourselves, but still, the house remains, completely ready and close to the centre. Game console: we offer the base of Nintento Switch
neighborhood_overview: The neigborhood used to be a working-class area for the workers in the nearby factories who were all closed in the nineties. The area is now in an upward spiral, as it is close to the centre. Lots of young families are moving in. It is also very multicultural. There are lots of shops and restaurants too. And also lots of green parks and areas.

name: Charming house nearby city center
description:
Ideal location for those who want to explore Ghent on foot and still like to sleep peacefully. There are 2 full bedrooms, each with a double bed of 160cm wide. In the attic there is an extra room with a sofa bed (120cm). Equipped kitchen and bathroom with bath. There is wifi and TV. It is a charming, small but cozy house and it will become nice and warm inside in no time. Bed, bath and kitchen linen available. You can park your car in the street for max. 5 hours.

The space
The house itself is cozy and authentic. There is a travel baby bed and toys for those who want to come as a family. There are 2 toilets in the house and a bathtub in the bathroom. Equipped kitchen with gas stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle and a kitchen blender. Coffee, tea and herbs are provided. After every guest visit, there is thorough ventilation, cleaning and disinfection. There is disinfectant gel in the living room. Very welcome here!

Guest access
You h
neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect: in 15 minutes you are in the center on foot and you sleep very quietly here. Older people, students, families with children live there, ... it's a diverse neighbourhood. In the Ooilamstraat itself there is a pleasant atmosphere between the neighbours, many know each other well and there is very little traffic in the street. In the immediate vicinity (max 5min walking) there are 3 parks, with or without a playground, and also several restaurants that are not touristy at all. Nearby there is the Lousbergmarkt where you can buy local organic products or get a takeaway meal. Gent-Dampoort station is a 10-minute walk away. You can also rent bicycles there. In short, you never have to go far to find what you are looking for.

name: "Desk till Dawn"
description:
Ruim duplex-designerappartement met dakterras.

Het ultieme genot van dit appartement is dat het ruim is. Het is 175 m2 groot inclusief het terras. Alle leefruimtes zijn nauwkeurig en verrassend met elkaar verbonden. Je hoeft het met niemand te delen behalve met de aanwezigheid van onze plantencollectie.

Op verzoek is er privé parkeergelegenheid en kan je van onze eigen fietsen gebruik maken. Beleef meer in minder tijd !

Trein en bus zijn vlakbij.

The space
De leefruimtes van het appartement liggen op de tweede verdieping in het gebouw. Deze verdieping is bereikbaar met een lift. Vanaf de eigenzinnig privé inkomhall zijn de volgende ruimtes onmiddellijk bereikbaar: Keuken, eetplaats, berging, bureau en de zitruimte.
De keuken is volledig uitgerust en voorzien van een kookeiland. Het buitenterras is vanaf hier bereikbaar via een schuifraam. De aparte eetplaats is vanaf de keuken zichtbaar doorheen een doorkijkkast.
Er is
neighborhood_overview:
De buurt is voorzien van een ruim aanbod van basisvoorzieningen.

Naast de aanwezigheid van ons geliefde historische stadscentrum vinden wij het Rozenbroekepark het leukst in onze buurt. De ingang van dat park ligt op 350 meter. Het bevat een dichtbebost gebied met oudere bomen en eveneens open gedeelten. Perfect om de dag met een frisse neus te starten of af te sluiten.
Er zijn Finse pistes aangelegd voor de sportievelingen maar ook smalle asfalt- en betonwegjes voor de fietsers en wandelaars. Ook een speeltuin is voorzien. Op het einde van het park, op 1,5 km wandelen van het appartement is er het Olympisch zwembad (Lago Rozenbroeken). Er zijn eveneens wellness mogelijkheden en recreatiebaden met glijbanen.

Eveneens vlakbij:

Supermarkten:
100 meter (Colruyt - ook open op zaterdag)
350 meter (Delhaize - ook open op zondag)
650 meter (kleine Delhaize supermarkt bij tankstation Q8 - 24/24 7/7 open)

name: Spacious family home in Ghent
description:
Welcome in our house just outside the city center of Ghent!

We can accomodate 5 up to 7 guests, both adults and kids will feel at home.

The house has a well equiped kitchen with dining table (2 high chairs), living room & play area, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms + separate toilet. You can also enjoy the garden with barbecue or our spacious balcony.

Every room is available for you. Our cat Kasper will check if you are taking well care of our stuff;-). Please provide him with some food and love?
neighborhood_overview: Perfect mix of city vibes of Ghent & greenery outside the city (Bourgoyen nature reservation park, Vinderhoutse bossen = forest, Claeys-Bouuaert park, ...). Friendly neighbours. Supermarkets, bakery, pharmacy, bus station etcetera all closeby, you can borrow our bikes if needed.

name: Appartment Keizerpark
description:
The studio is the complete top floor of our house, full privacy.
Part of the stairs, hallway and frontdoor is shared. The studio has 3 separate rooms: the bathroom with rainshower, toilet, sink; the kitchen/livingroom with kitchen and a comfy couch plus TV on the mezzanine; the bedroom/study with a desk and a bed on a mezzanine. There is lots of natural light in the kitchen and bedroom. The kitchen is brandnew, with a cappuccinomachine, an electric ketle, an oven, induction hobs and more.

The space
The facade is south oriented, so lots of light during the day.
There are a lot of windows.
The rooms are located under the roof, but have high ceilings and the 2 main rooms have a mezzanine, which makes the rooms very spacious.
There is a curtain to block the light on the sleep mezzanine, not very well visible on the pictures.

The kitchen is fully equiped, there is a duvet in the bedroom and lots of pillows.
I offer clean towels an
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a nice quiet neighbourhood. There is a park by the water, 2minutes walkingdistance. There is also a nature reserve 10minutes walking away, where you can go for a run or just enjoy nature. We live close to the water so nice scenery's all around. (I can give some good tips for nice jogging routes!)
Public transport is very acessible from our house and can bring you to the station, the citycenter or where ever. The highway is also easy acces, E17,E40 and R4.
Shops of all sorts, gasstations, nightshops, supermarkets are at walkingdistance.
From our house you can walk to the citycenter, a nice route that follows the water. 15minutes walk.

name: Casa Violetta
description:
Casa Violetta is op wandelafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden in Gent-centrum. Het appartement is van alle benodigdheden voorzien: keuken, badkamer met douche, slaapkamer met televisietoestel en snelle wifi.
Voor de gasten die met de wagen naar de stad komen kunnen wij een beveiligde parkeerplaats voorzien in de straat tegen betaling (15€ per etmaal).

The space
De studio bij St.-Anna ligt op wandelafstand van het historisch centrum van Gent.

Guest access
In de studio is plaats voor twee gasten. U beschikt er over een keuken, toilet, badkamer met douche, slaapkamer en lees- en televisiehoek.

Other things to note
Indien u dat wenst kunt u onze privé-parkeerplaats of fietsen huren. De studio is gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de wagen. Parkeren op straat is echter duur. De hele omgeving is gemakkelijk te bezichtigen met de fiets.
neighborhood_overview: Wij werken zelf in de stad en ons zoontje gaat om de hoek naar school. De buurt heeft veel gezellige restaurantjes en bars. Ontbijten kan ter plekke, maar even gemakkelijk in koffiebars en ontbijtgelegenheden op wandelafstand. Er is een gezellige bioscoop op de hoek van de straat. Winkels en supermarkten zijn vlakbij.
host_about:
We're a couple in our thirties and just got the nicest son! Just before Edgar was born we lived in the apartment ourselves for three years. Now we live next door. We love travelling and now we started a family, we hope to enjoy the visits of other people exploring our beloved city: GENT
Whoever visits Ghent for the first time or even more, will hear us tell enthousistic about where to go to eat, to walk, to see and visit ...

description:
The apartment is situated in the same street as the Gravensteen Castle. No need to take public transport, you're right in the middle of.. just everything ;)

On sunny days, it's great to relax in the peaceful park right behind the house. Tramway to the train station stops just across the street.

The space
You have a basic kitchenette at your disposal (fridge, sink, microwave, watercooker, senseo machine). Not suited to cook elaborately, luckily we are located in the town center, so coffee bars, restaurants & grocery stores are right around the corner!

name: A beautiful and quiet haven
description:
Marie and Tom would like to host you in their house in Ghent and guarantee you a comfortable stay and warm welcome.
Tom is a notorious chef, his restaurant ‘Haven' is just around the corner.
Marie is a notorious mom and loves all things tasty and adventurous.
We love to do things with passion, with taste and with our heart.
We both love traveling and at the same time we are in love with the city of Ghent.
It is beautiful.
It is pleasant.
There is so much to see and do in this historical city!

The space
The house was built 6 years ago. It is located in a quiet neighborhood full of character, close to the Leie and just a 5 minute walk from the city centre.
The modern and stylish house has 3 floors and 3 terraces and is bathed in an atmosphere of light and tranquility.
We think you will love it.

name: Studio Stan, moderne studio centrum Gent
description:
Hello there and welcome to Studio Stan!

Brand new, bright and modern studio (40m2) in the heart of Ghent. The studio comes with a covered parking space, a kitchenette, has its own private bathroom with walk-in shower and a living/bedroom overlooking the private garden. name: Tipi amazing experience ! Nature & Culture Gent
description:
Tipi Casita Loquita.
Elk zuchtje wind vertelt het verhaal van zijn reis...
Als je goed genoeg luistert, hoor je het fluisteren.
Dat is de zachte roep om avontuur die je de wildernis inlokt.
Deze authentieke Tipi ademt enkel liefde en warmte uit!
Het vuur in het midden zorgt voor een onvergetelijke nacht.
Het is een beleving waar Natuur & cultuur elkaar de hand schudden. Op 4 km het charmante Gent.
Puur natuur & toch alle comfort met winkels en zwembad & Welness op 2 km van je tipi! Welkom!

The space
Nomadic TIPI. from the states.
Exclusive romantic vacation! It's unique and the location is a perfect combination between Nature & City!
Living by nature!
In the cold season we have a heater in case , wool blankets, rendeer, but always take extra warm clothes. See you soon!

Guest access
Tipi 100%+ graden! * Swimming pool
Bathroom & toilet inside the Villa. ECO- TOILET soon in the gar
neighborhood_overview: In the middle of nature and 5 min from the wood. Silence hood and comfort bakery with brunch. 7/7 Little supermarket in the street. Bus to the historic center Ghent , 5km. Tropical and Olympic swimming & Wellness pool in walking distance.
host_about:
We Are Travellers. How adventurous are you?
Collect moments, not things...
Travelling is like falling in love, you are less critical and only see the nice things...
Hi dear friends!! Welcome to Casita Loquita!!

name: Boatie's * Bed bad boot
description:
Aye!
Langs de oever van de Schelde stellen wij de master bedroom van onze woonboot te huur voor een verblijf van minstens 2 nachten. Je vertoeft op wandelafstand van het historische mooie Gent, rustig dobberend in een groene omgeving.
Je beschikt over een knusse kamer in de achterroef met een stijlvolle privé badkamer.
De zonsondergang op het dek staat tot je beschikking, al valt deze te delen met de kapitein en zijn matrozen.

The space
* inschepen langs de stuurhut
* dubbel bed in maritieme stijl
* fancy fiance badkamer met boottoilet, ligbad en douche
* heerlijk sunshine-happiness dek

Guest access
De boot ligt op 25 min wandelen van Gent Sint-Pieters alsook 20 min van Gent Zuid (bus/ tram).
Gent laat zich heerlijk fietsen. Te huur in Gent Sint-Pieters.
Kom je met de auto, dan kan je betalend parkeren in de omliggende straten. De boot ligt buiten de Lage Emissie Zone Gent.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
De woonboot ligt op de groene Scheldearm tussen Gent-centrum & Merelbeke. Rustige ligging langs het wandel- en fietspad.
Voedingswinkels vind je dichtbij in Ledeberg; alsook de zondagse markt!
host_about: Aye!

name: Verne Dreams : California
description:
Verne Dreaming is een fantastische keuze voor reizigers in Gent. Het biedt een romantische omgeving en veel nuttige voorzieningen voor tijdens je verblijf. Dompel je onder in de California rooftop loft.

Verne Dreaming is een Bed & Experience, het biedt tevens Tarot lezingen (www.tarotmerlot.be) en meditatie (www.qimono.be) op aanvraag aan.

Gastheer Vincent Verschooris ontvangt er U persoonlijk en bezorgt U mede een onvergetelijke ervaring. Laat je door Gent gidsen door een local hero!
host_about:
A fan of the Wabi-Sabi art that I try to express into my lifestyle and the interior of Shelter 7 and Verne Dreams. 
I’m a content and positive person, always curious to meet new people and connect with new synergies.

name: Spacious room with sunny terrace, close to Ghent
description:
Charming room for two people close to the centre of Ghent. Alice, Karel and Snuggles (our cat) are happy to welcome you in Ghent!

The space
The room is on the first floor close to the (shared) bathroom and separate (shared) toilet.

You'l have a spacious double bed with a window on the south side that provides a lot of natural and cosy light.

The room has a desk with an extra computer screen which is ideal for a working holiday. There is unlimited wifi so you'll have no issues during a videocall or online meeting. Computer is not provided bring your own laptop.

Guest access
Our house is located in a quiet residential area, very close to every major highway (E17, E40 and R4) and public transport (Tram 2 to the centre, bus 9 to the train station).

The city centre is only 10 minutes away by tram and the Gentbrugse Meersen are at walking distance from the house (it is really a great nature reserve for walking
neighborhood_overview: Our house is very close to the old city centre of Ghent. You can take the tram or bus (5 minute) walk and hop on to the centre (10 minutes). We have shops, bakeries, butchers and some really great restaurants close by! The Gentbrugse Meersen, a greenbelt is just a few minutes walking. The train station of Gentbrugge is just 200 meters and will take you to the other cities in Belgium (Brussels:40 minutes, Bruges: 30 minutes, Antwerp: 1h,...)

name: Gentbrugge, het is niet Gent, het is niet Brugge.
description:
Je logeert in een knusse studio in een losstaand gebouw met privé ingang.

The space
Er is een ruime badkamer met inloopdouche. Je vindt er alle basisvoorzieningen zoals, koffiezet, waterkoker, microgolf en koelkast. De zetel kan worden ingezet als slaapbank. Vraag gerust naar een kinderbedje en speelgoed.
Er is een gedeeld zonnig buitenterras. Je kan de pizzaoven en barbecue gebruiken. Je betaalt alleen het hout, de rookmot en de kolen.
Wij voorzien op aanvraag ontbijt. Lunch en diner kunnen ook worden voorzien. Het weekendmenu wordt je meegedeeld bij aankomst. Al ons eten is zo biologisch en lokaal als mogelijk, maar vooral vers en huisbereid.
neighborhood_overview:
Gentbrugge is de kalme kleine broer van Gent. Je wandelt een half uurtje langs het prachtige water van de visserij naar hartje Gent. Of openbaar vervoer brengt je er binnen het kwartier.
Maar in Gentbrugge vind je alles wat je nodig hebt.
Supermarkten, bakker, slager, en een turkse kruidenierszaak op wandelafstand.
Het is de perfecte uitvalsbasis om te lopen langs de Schelde en het is het ideale startpunt om te fietsen langs Vlaamse wegen.
Er is een leuke speeltuin op 5 minuten wandelen en de Gentbrugse Meersen is een ware wandeloase. Opgepast voor de wilde koeien!

name: Cozy retro house in Ghent, with tub and garden!
description:
Welcome!

My cozy, renovated house on the outskirts of Ghent is located in a quiet street in Ledeberg.
You will find all modern comforts: Wi-Fi, washing machine, fitted kitchen with SMEG gas stove, refrigerator. And all this in retro 50s style. (Pastel all the way!;))

Shops, the market square and the Keizerpark are within walking distance. The center & station Gent-Sint-Pieters can be reached in 5 minutes by public transport. As well as the entrance and exit of the highway (2min / car)

The space
It is a small but cozy house with only open spaces. Downstairs you have the kitchen and living room with a beautiful view on the garden. The large sliding windows provide pleasant light. There is a comfortable sofa with a flat screen TV, books are also available. Upstairs you have a spacious bright bedroom with a double bed, an authentic cast iron claw foot tub (!!), sink and a large sunny balcony. There is also an electric piano for the musical
neighborhood_overview: Everything is within walking distance. Bakers, butcher, supermarkets such as Delhaize (in the same street) and Colruyt (5min on foot). The market square is one street away, here every Sunday morning there is a market full of nice, local products! The bus and tram stops are also just around the corner. Within a 5-minute walk you have the Keizerpark, a popular and beautiful park along the water.

If you’re searching for a home that feels like home in beautiful Ghent, then this is the place to be!

The ground-floor apartment is a very bright, cosy, peaceful and stylish decorated open space with lots of natural light overlooking the peaceful 45 square meter garden with jacuzzi where you can relax and unwind.

I highly recommend this place for people working in the neighbourhood for a few weeks/months or families with young children who want to explore GHENT and the rest of Belgium.

The space
This fully furnished warm and cozy renovated apartment can host 3 adults +2 children. It has a comfortable sofa, digital smart tv, dining table and a very well-equipped kitchen. It is stocked with basics to get you started like spices, olive oil, coffee, tea,…
It also has 3 bedrooms, 1 master bedroom with kingsize bed and 2 smaller bedrooms with one single bed in one room and a kid’s bunk bed in the other room.
There’s one stylish bathroom

host_about:

I’m a swim instructor and Group Fitness Trainer. I’m passionate about physical and mental health. On how to combine both and live a life in full awareness and gratitude .

name: 'tBegijnhof
description:
Other things to note
As you might have guessed, our name was derived from the Old Saint-Elisabeth Beguinage just around the corner. If history is your thing, you've come to the right place. Our neighbourhood is also known as the 'holy corner' where you can find no less than three different churches close by. The Saint-Elisabeth church hosts Anglican services, whilst an Orthodox and Protestant church are only 5 minutes walking distance. Can't get enough of history? Make sure to head to the city centre for a visit to the 'Gravensteen', Ghent's medieval castle, situated at the edge of the bustling city centre. Fine dining, take-out, good coffee or a quick bite, all that and more can be found at walking distance.

Welcome to Ghent!

The studio/bedroom has a wardrobe with extra bed linen, coat hooks, towels and a hairdryer. There is coffee and tea provided in this studio + cutlery and plates. There is a table and a lounge. Guest access

In the cozy living room you find the (smart)- television (you can link your

description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated. The 2nd floor is completely at the disposal of guests. 2 fully equiped bedrooms with desk space.

You share the bathroom with me on the first floor (if I'm there that is). There is a jet stream bath, 2 sinks and a separate shower. On the first floor there is also a separate guest toilet.

Everything can be shared on the ground floor: city courtyard, kitchen,
TV, dining room... mi casa es su casa.

Free parking: 200m. Station: 800m

The space
Second floor:
- room one: double bed, desk, chair, coffee and tea, closet space, books...
- room two: single bed who can be made as a double as well, space to hang your clothes

Guest access
Free parking at 200m (in front of the house you need to pay)
800m from station Dampoort
50m from busstop (bus 6, 17 and 18)

Other things to note
I HAVE A DOG. If i'm not travelli
neighborhood_overview: Quiet area close to city center, walking distance (just next to the old beguinage).
host_about:
I like to travel across Europe, when I have more money i'll go further away :)

Interests: photography, modern art, good coffee, history, long walks, snowboarding...

Currently working at an university college in Bruges as a lecturer in educational sciences, social sciences and psychology

I'm in my mid-thirtees and I don't go out very late, when travelling I like to get up early and discover city's or area's. This means that I'm tired around midnight haha :)

name: Spacious house with garden near historical center
description:
This spacious house is located within walking distance of the historic center in a quiet neighbourhood with shops and public transport around the corner.
The house has 3 bedrooms. A childfriendly room with a cot and single bed.
The other rooms have double beds and spacious closets.
The bathroom is next to the rooms and equipped with towels.
The kitchen is fully equipped and the garden is peacuful with lots of greens.
I can speak English, Dutch, Spanish and basic French.
You are very welcome! :)

name: Luxurious loft in centre + convertible VW Beetle
description:
You are in luck! You have stumbled upon your ideal PRIVATE 300m2 stay in the historic centre of Ghent. The loft was once a textile factory from around 1850, and was recently renovated to this lovely home: an incredible combination of authenticity and comfort.

Convertible VW Beetle + free parking spot included
Luxurious arrangements on demand

The space
The grandeur of “Hof ten Walle” awaits you, when you drive up to this monument, park your car in front, enter the spacious living room, open the windows with view on the park and the waterside, when you play a piece on the antique grand piano (1907, NY) or pick your favorite out of two rooftop terraces where you poor in your aperitif. First Cold bottle + tapas are on the house!

About the loft...

GROUND FLOOR
driveway
garage
washing room with washer dryer combination

FIRST FLOOR (accessible with elevator / stairs)
open kitchen and living room

name: Perfect Studio for a short stay in Gent

name: Guesthouse with natural vibe - bikes included
description:
Renovated in 2021 guest house/studio with separate entrance and large shared garden.
For 1 or 2 guests.
In a quiet green suburb of Ghent 4 km from the city center.
At 2 km from nature reserve Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen.
Beautiful cycling routes in the area.
We have 2 free bicycles available for you.
Supermarket, bakery, butcher, ... within walking/cycling distance.
Bus and tram stop less than 1 km away.

The space
The residence is an outbuilding next to our own house. The interior walls are finished with clay. This gives it a warm and natural look where you can completely relax. The room is equipped with wall heating that you can control yourself with a thermostat.
The window on the south side overlooks the large communal garden.
There is a kitchenette with oven/microwave, mini fridge. There are no hot plates, but there is a kettle.
A small bathroom with walk-in shower, sink and toilet and shower products.
1 double
neighborhood_overview:
Green environment.
From the green to the city center in twenty minutes by bike.
It is quiet, yet all amenities are easily accessible.
Supermarket, bakery, butcher within walking distance.
Every Sunday morning there is a food market nearby.
Tourist brochures are provided, as well as free Wifi so that you can plan your trips quietly and easily.
host_about: Ik en mijn man wonen met onze 2 dochters en 1 kat in Mariakerke, bij Gent en verhuren een gastenverblijf aan onze eigen woning. We hebben al meermaals via airbnb geboekt als reiziger en zijn trots nu zelf ook host te zijn. Welkom!

name: Full apartment near Sint Pieters Station
description:
This is a 2 bedroom apartment. Guests will enjoy easy access to everything in the apartment.

The space
One bedroom has a bunk bed while other has an extendable 1 or 2 person bed. You can choose which room/bed you want to use.
Kitchen is fully equipped (no dishwasher) and available for use.
You can also do laundry (not between 20:00 to 08:00).

Guest access
Apartment has 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bath. Guests have access to everything in the apartment. Apartment is not super furnished and adapted to our children's need. We list our place only when we travel to help other travellers like us find a suitable place :)

Pictures may differ slightly.

host_about:
I love to travel, learn about cultures and tell others about mine.  Food is a big part of our culture, so don't hesitate to join me on dinner (guests).
I am clean, tidy and well managed. Always try to keep things in order. 
I respect and care for concerns, belief, requirements and privacy . 
I am sure you will not regret hosting me or being my guest :)

name: Gezellige privéloft in centrum Gent
description:
This beautiful accommodation is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food of this amazing city but your good night sleep is also guaranteed!

Your own private and comfortable studio is on the 2 floor of our private home
The building is very centrally located: bus/tram stops nearby, several public car parks only minutes away, supermarket & groceries at less than 200 meters.

The space
This contemporary studio provides you with all the comfort you need: your own bathroom with shower, double bed, hairdryer, free WiFi, free city map and our own personal guide with all our favorite addresses. There is no kitchen but in the living area you have a microwave, fridge, and facilities for coffee and tea.
Just to be clear, the shower and the toilet are in the same space as the bedroom and living area but is separated by a curtain.

Other things to note

name: Large modern house 10min from downtown Ghent/Gent
description:
Just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent. Our spacious modern house sleeps 6 people, features a large open seating area, kitchen and eating area. Garden with pond, terrace, outdoor table. Three bedrooms with the desired beds upon request. You are renting the complete house while we live abroad. Our house is just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent by car, tram (stop 500m) or bicycle. Free on street parking in front. Indoor (2) bicycle storage. We welcome children but no large pets.

The space
Living room: very spacious with 6 person couch. 77" TV with 7.1 Dolby Surround (no cable TV but Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ available). View on garden, terrace and swimming pond (not heated). Living, kitchen and dining area are one big open space.

Kitchen: features a gas cooking plate, hot air oven, Nespresso Dolce Gusto, classic coffee machine, toaster, waterboiler, dishwasher.

Dining area: very large dining table seats 10 persons.

name: Comfortable spacious bedroom near shops & uni
description:
Gent is a beautiful & historic city. We're located between the main train station and the centre of town, so it's a perfect spot to come and explore based out of our lovely home.

The room features a large bed and lots of storage. We keep everything very clean and tidy, and the house has a great kitchen/dining room with everything you need to cook.

The city also has a vibrant university & student population. We have welcomed Erasmus/researchers too, so we welcome longer stays.

See you soon!

The space
Your bedroom is on the first floor of our home. You share the ground-floor bathroom with the other Airbnb bedroom/guests in our house. The bathroom is accessed by passing through the kithen/living room.

This room faces our back garden and is very peacful and quiet. There is a shutter-blind on the window for a complete blackout on the window.

Guest access
Your bedroom is private with a lock on the door.

name: Le Petit Bordeleau
description:
Enjoy a stay on board of a 1952 barge with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a romantic waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one loft. All 3 have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le petit bordeleau is one of the studios in a trendy loft style.
If necessary, This studio can be connected with the big loft. Together they can be used by 4 persons, with 2 bed and bathrooms

Guest access
Tea, Nespresso and water included. Use of bikes possible on demand.
neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays, most warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour site is now the biggest protected city view of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.

name: Modern ruim appartement direct aan station Gent SP
description:
Vanuit ons centraal gelegen appartement ligt het gezellige levendige Gent binnen handbereik. De ligging nét aan Station Gent-Sint-Pieters maakt dat u beschikt over verbindingen met trein, tram, bus en taxi, nét voor de deur (1 min). De gezellige en veilige buurt biedt een 7/7 supermarkt, winkels, bars, restaurants, nachtwinkel (allen op 1 min) en een groen stadspark met speeltuin in de onmiddelijke omgeving. De straat is verkeersarm en dus opvallend rustig. Het appartement biedt alle comfort.

The space
Ons ruim en modern appartement heeft een ruime afgescheiden slaapkamer met dubbel bed en met sofa, smart TV en dressingkast. In de hal met vestiaire treft u tevens een apart toilet aan. De badkamer heeft een ligbad, douche en 2 lavabo's. De volledig uitgeruste keuken beschikt over een fornuis (4 kookplaten), een frigo met vriesvak, koffiezet, servies, basisprodukten, glazen en bestek. De eethoek biedt plaats aan 4 personen. De ruime mezzanine (verdiep hoger) heeft
neighborhood_overview: Ons gezellig appartement is werkelijk ideaal gelegen net aan het Station Gent-Sint-Pieters. De transport-connecties zijn ronduit excellent. De stationsbuurt is een mooie, nette en veilige buurt. De buurt telt heel wat prima bars en restaurants. Ook de supermarkten en nachtwinkels in de straat van de accomodatie zijn allen van een prima kwaliteit. Het historische Citadelpark ligt op 5 min stappen. Een korte wandeling (10 min) brengt je in het groene recreatiedomein 'De Blaarmeersen' (zandstrand, speeltuinen, horeca en sport).

description:

It as converted in 2020 into 3 apartments and 1 bakery on the ground floor. Each apartment is available only 4 months of the year and is used by the owners for the remaining 8 months. The apartments were carefully restored and furnished with top design pieces. Super central location, from each apartment you have a view on the historical buildings such as the Gerard de Duivelsteen of the 13theC.
neighborhood_overview: In het absolute centrum van de historische binnenstad. Vanuit het appartement zicht op het Gerard de Duivelsteen. Een gebouw dat dateert van de 13° eeuw.
host_about: Family with 3 girls. Peter is a project developer/owner at Rietveldprojects and Leen works as Ass. Director at Procter & Gamble.

name: Gezellige bel-etage met tuintje
description:
Welkom in ons huis in de Brugse Poort in Gent

Ons huis ligt op een ideale ligging in een sprankelende buurt waar veel te doen is, en op slecht 2km van het historische centrum. Ideaal om Gent te leren kennen.

We heten je van harte welkom en geven je graag persoonlijke tips om het meeste uit je verblijf in Gent te halen.

The space
De benedenverdieping bestaat uit een hal, een garage met wasplaats en een extra toilet. Via de garage kom je in een heerlijk rustig stadstuintje, ideaal om de ochtend te beginnen of de avond af te sluiten na een dagje Gent. Het is een zonnige tuin met heerlijke schaduwplekjes dankzij de bladeren van de bomen.

Op de eerste verdieping vind je de lichtrijke woonkamer en keuken met zicht op de tuin terug. De keuken is volledig uitgerust, met vaatwasser en een groot assortiment kruiden.

name: Lichtrijke slaapkamer met badkamer
description:
Welkom in onze rijwoning in de stadswijk Ledeberg, aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Van hieruit kan je de historische stad Gent ontdekken met tram, bus, fiets of te voet.

Wie bieden je een twee persoons slaapkamer met eigen badkamer op de tweede verdieping van de woning aan.

The space
Een privé slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed vol natuurlijk licht en recent gerenoveerd.

Een eigen badkamer (aansluitend in de ruimte) is voorzien, alsook kan de kamer gekoeld worden via airco indien nodig.

Verder kan je gebruik maken van wifi, een Nespresso koffiemachine en een mini koelkast.

Het gastentoilet ligt op de eerste verdieping. De kamer zelf is op de tweede verdieping, hou dus wel rekening met de trap.

De andere kamers van de woning zoals keuken, leefruimte en terras kan je ook gebruiken, maar zijn wel gedeeld met onszelf.

Other things to note
De toeristen belasting van Stad
neighborhood_overview:
Onze woning ligt in een rustige straat in Ledeberg, een stadswijk aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Vlakbij vind je een supermarkt, frituur, bakker en beenhouwer. Ook enkele kleine cafeetjes en eetplekjes. Op zondag is er elke week een grote markt op Ledebergplein.

De leukste en mooiste plekjes en adresjes, die vind je natuurlijk in het historisch centrum van Gent.

Met de bus- of tramhalte op 2 minuten wandelen ben je een boogscheut verwijderd van het hart van de Stad Gent.

Met de fiets een tiental minuten, te voet een twintigtal minuten.

Geniet van de Arteveldestad in al zijn aspecten. Een terrasje in onze autoluwe stad, een mooie wandeling langs de historische gebouwen, een fietsritje langs de Leie, een bezoek aan het Lam Gods in de Sint-Baafskathedraal, een rondleiding in het Stedelijk Museum voor Actuele Kunst (SMAK). Hier kan je het allemaal beleven in de meest gezellige stad van Vlaanderen.

name: Puur Patershol
description:
Genieten in het historische centrum van Gent, het Patershol.
Onze Airbnb ligt in het hartje van Gent. Overal dichtbij en zoveel te ontdekken. Gelukkig wonen we in een rustige straat, je hebt dus geen last van het nachtlawaai.

The space
De kamer bevindt zich op het gelijkvloers.

- Er is 1 groot tweepersoonsbed
- Wifi is gratis beschikbaar
- Er zijn geen kookfaciliteiten (= geen keuken/kookplaten/magnetron/oven)
- Een frigo is wel aanwezig

Guest access
De gehele onderverdieping is voor jullie dit houdt in, de kamer, badkamer
+ terras, de gang is gemeenschappelijk.

Other things to note
De airbnb is niet bereikbaar met de auto.
Gent = lage emissie zone.

Gratis de auto parkeren kan aan Dok-Noord. Dit is 15 minuten wandelen.

Betalend parkeren: wij raden de parking van de Vrijdagmarkt aan omdat deze dichterbij is. Deze is 4 minuten wandelen.

name: Bright and Cosy Little House in the City Centre
description:
Escape the world for a moment in this peaceful, centrally located accommodation.

The space
Warm, bright and cosy south oriented house. The kitchen and dining area are located on the ground floor, as well as the toilet in the hallway. On the atmospheric first floor, there's a relaxing sofa and equipment to watch a movie on the big screen :-) The living room is connected to a little balcony, on which you can enjoy the last rays of sunshine. The bedroom on the second floor contains a spacious double bed, a shower and a bathroom cabinet.

Guest access
Unfortunately, parking on site is not possible. You can find parking in the streets surrounding the site. Note: parking is paid here.
neighborhood_overview: While the house radiates an atmosphere of peace and quiet, it's located in the heart of Ghent. Near the water of Dok Noord, the train station of Gent Dampoort and only a 15 min walk (or a 5 min bicycle ride) from the historic city centre and the shopping streets.

name: Typical townhouse in Ghent
description:
Looking for a typical and cosy stay in Ghent?

This tiny house is a 19th Century accommodation located in one of the oldest "cité" (pedestrian area) of Ghent.

You are at walking distance from the city center (15 min) in a lively neighbourhood where you find shops, cafes and other amenities as well as the biggest natural park of the region.

The space
The house has a bedroom, a bathroom, an open living space with kitchen. The living space includes a sofabed.
Outside there is a nice open-air court, shared with 3 other similar houses that can be used for outdoor barbecues during summer or campfires during winter.

Guest access
The city center is at walking distance (15 min), reachable by bike (a nice ride next to the river) or by public transport (for example bus 3 is just across the street).

The main train station, Gent-sint-pieters, is reachable by Tram 4 (15 min) which stops 300 meters from the house.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the "brugsepoort" neighbourhood, located in the north-west of Ghent. This area is very lively, thanks to the presence of various commercial activities as shops, bakeries, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes.

We can give several advises to the curious guests!

The studio is situated on the first floor and has 1 double bed a kitchenette and shower with lavatory.

Guest access

name: Amazing studio located in Ghent
description:
Our beautiful apartment is perfectly suited to discover Ghent, it is situated in the historic heart of Ghent, ideal to enjoy the cultural medieval city . Within a 2 min walk, you have all the landmarks that Medieval Ghent has to offer; Graslei, Korenmarkt, the Castle of Counts, Saint Bavo's Cathedral, the Design museum and much more. You can also enjoy a cosy night inside, enjoying Netflix. The apartment is located about 150 meters from the underground parking "sint-michiels".

Other things to note
There is no elevator in the building.
host_about: Hi i'm tony,  I’m an easy going and caring guy who loves to meet new people. I’ve stayed at Airbnb’s all over the world and have met some great people on the platform who I now call my friends.

name: Lichtrijk huis in rustige kindvriendelijke wijk
description:
Rustige uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan het historisch centrum van Gent op slechts 3,4km.

Onze nieuwbouwwoning ligt in een autoluwe woonwijk rond een park. Er is geen doorgaand verkeer. Ideaal voor een picknick of voor kinderen om op de straat te spelen, fietsen, steppen,..

Gratis koffie, thee, water en parking.

The space
Het gelijkvloers is een open lichtrijke ruimte met daarin de keuken, eethoek, living en trap.
Aan de achterzijde is een privétuin met houten terras. Aan de voorzijde is het zalig aperitieven in de avondzon.
Het eerste verdiep heeft 2 slaapkamers. Één met een queensize tweepersoonsbed en de andere met n ergonomische matras op een lattenbodem en op de grond en een peuterbed.

Guest access
2 grote gratis parkings op 50m van de woonst.
350m bus naar het historisch centrum
2,3 km van treinstation Gent Dampoort

Other things to note
Onze eigen spullen zullen ook
neighborhood_overview:
Onze nieuwbouwwoning ligt in een autoluwe woonwijk rond een park. Er is geen doorgaand verkeer. In onze straat zijn bijna altijd kinderen aan het spelen, fietsen, steppen, putten graven, ... In het park zijn verschillende speelmogelijkheden zoals een wilgenhut, klimboom en basketbalgoal. De meeste bewoners van de straat zijn gezinnen met kinderen van piepjong tot tieners. Vlakbij zijn verschillende binnen en buiten speeltuinen, een subtropisch zwemparadijs,...

350 m: bakker
850m: dichtste speeltuin
1,1 km: supermarkt
1,4 km: subtropisch zwemparadijs, olympisch zwembad, kleine binnenspeeltuin
2,3 km: Gent Dampoort
3,3 km: grote binnen speeltuin

name: Authentic house,  15’ walk from City center
description:
Authentic Ghentian house, 15’ Walk from city center. 4 bedrooms, 2 terraces. Relaxing neigbourhood.

The space
This house was rebuilt by a Ghentian artlover in the 70-ies. The house has a space age vibe all with vintage furniture and curiosa gadgets.

Guest access
The house is all yours, you don’t need to share any rooms with me

Other things to note
There are 4 gentle reptiles in the house, they are caged and don’t run around in the house. You do not have to take care of them.
If you are comfortable, i can show you how to handle them but do’nt feel obligated.
neighborhood_overview: You stay in a quiet area only 15 minutes walk from the city center. Just around the corner there is a laundry salon, grocery store, local restaurant, Italian restaurant, butcher
host_about:
Jonas, 33 year old entrepeneur in Hospitality in Ghent, Belgium.
Loves to travel and likes Air BnB allot! :)

name: Cosy Sous-Sol near the city center
description:
Come and relax in this cosy sous-sol on the little island at the edge of Ghent, the former service quarters of our house from 1912. With great care for the authentic elements, I have transformed this into a nice space with an eye for design. The space has a private access to the garden, where you can enjoy the green surroundings. It is located near the park at the old docks, and a stone's throw from the center.

The space
The space consists of a connecting living area and bedroom, a veranda with dining table, adjacent to the well-equipped kitchen (oven, stove, dishwasher) and the walk-in shower. The veranda gives access to the garden.

Please note that the bedroom and living area are only 2m high, so less suitable for people taller than 1m90.

Guest access
It is possible to get the keys out of the lockbox yourself, if desired I will of course be happy to receive you in person (I live above the studio). Parking is available in the s
neighborhood_overview: This sous-sol is located on the island 'de Muide', the former port area of Ghent. You can still find numerous references to the old glory days in the neighborhood, warehouses, cranes, etc. Nearby a park has been laid out with a small beach overlooking the old docks. The city center is a fifteen minute walk, or just take the tram 200m from our door.

name: Gezellige moderne woning vlakbij Gent
description:
Moderne, nieuwe woning nabij Gent. Op het gelijkvloers vind je de grote leefruimte bestaande uit salon, eetplaats en keuken.
De trap leidt je naar de eerste verdieping met de 3 slaapkamers en badkamer.
Op elke verdieping bevindt zich een apart toilet.
De woning heeft een voortuintje met carport aan en een achtertuin.
Ze is gelegen in een rustige buurt op en boogscheut van Gent centrum (op 3 km), vlot bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer en fiets.

The space
Er is een slaapkamer aanwezig met 1 dubbel bed en twee slaapkamers met telkens een dubbel bed en hoogslaper.

Guest access
Op 500m bevindt zich een tramhalte. Elke 6 minuten (overdag) of 20 minuten ('s avonds) heb je een tram naar Gent centrum (duur 20 min) of Station (duur 30 min). In de straat kan gratis geparkeerd worden. Onder de carport kan 1 auto staan.
neighborhood_overview: Rustige omgeving, ideaal huis om te verblijven met kinderen en toch vlakbij Gent centrum. Vlakbij zijn vele supermarkten te vinden alsook enkele winkels en restaurants/afhaalmogelijkheden.

description:
Located in the heart of the historical city center as well next to public parking "Sint- Michiels", "Ramen" and 'WATT".

The historical city and a large variety of restaurants & bars are within easy walking distance. It is only a 5 minute walk to the famous Sint- Michiels Bridge and Gravensteen Castle.

Modern renovated bathroom with a bath and a shower, hairdryer, shampoo, shower- gel, soaps, towels and bed linnen, a beautiful but small patio/terrace, free Wifi, television, ...

name: Le Grand Bordeleau
description:
Enjoy a stay on board of 1952 barge with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one big loft. All three have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le grand bordeleau is the trendy loft. If necessary, the loft can be connected with one studio. Together they can be used by four persons, with two beds and 2 bathrooms. The loft is perfect for long term or business stays.

Guest access
Tea, nespresso and water included. Use of bikes possible on demand.
neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays most warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour site is now the biggest protected city view of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.
host_about:
Hello,
As I am a 'globe trotter', I allways like to meet new people and experience new  cultures. Gastronomy and design are my key words. If you want to share the same passions like I have? Just come and stay in my luxury 19th century loft!

name: Villa with citygarden  for WE getaway or LT-stay
description:
A charming villa that combines the best of both worlds. This recently renovated house offers city garden, private (free) parking space and all amenities to enjoy the best of both worlds. Close to the Ghent City centre and still far enough to enjoy the peace and quite of a detached house.
Ghent-Dampoort station is a 6 minute walk.
Ideal for a romantic getaway or Long term stay with sufficient room to unwind.
For long-term stay inquiries or expats please send DM via Airbnb.
neighborhood_overview: Just next to the beautiful Rozebroek park and cute Azalea Park, the house offers the opportunity to unwind. Make sure to visit the quaint Begijnhof, just 1 block away.

name: Cosy Room Double Bed close to Dampoort train (1)
description:
In our house you’ll find a simple but clean and big room, located nearby the city centre (15 min. walk / 7 min. bus)

You can take the train to Dampoort train station, from where it's a 10 minute walk.
Or you can safely park on the street (€3/day)

Inside the house you’ll find a shared bathroom, coffee and water. The house has a little garden which is accessbile via the garage.

Me and my cat’s like to welcome you. We love to make a little time for you and listen to your request’s. 😃

The space
Your room is located on the upper floor of our house next to the bathroom. There is water and coffee available.

We also provide a guidebook with local tips from your host to make your stay the most comfortable we can :)

Guest access
You'll have access to your private room and shared bathroom and garden.

BUS
The bus stop is located 5 minutes from the house and there will be a bus passin
host_about:
Hi, I’m sander. I’m a musician, and give workshops and teambuildings with music. I’m very excited to meet new people. As a host you can aspect from me a warm welcome. And a nice chat, you’re always welcome to do so. 

I like guests that communicate easily, and keep me a bit informed about there plans. 

There’s always coffee or thee in 
the morning!
